Reviews.Content: Value for the money..Dolby soundLatest HardwareOnly Amazon apps available for install. if google apps available by default would be excellent

Reviews.Title: Amazon does it again!
Reviews.Author: Lucas Farnum "Lucas"
Reviews.Content: Overall, I really like the Kindle Fire HDX. it's very easy to use It has a very sharp screen, , and the price is right. It's the best tablet to consume Amazon content (along with the larger 8.9" Fire HDX tablet) and one of the two best 7" tablets for the price (along with the Google Nexus 7).

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Gail M Lipomi
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MY NEW KINDLE FIRE.  IT IS THINNER AND LIGHTER TO HANDLE THAN THE KINDLE FIRE.  THE IMAGES ARE VERY CLEAR AND THE COLORS ARE VIVID.

Reviews.Title: Like it alot.
Reviews.Author: Kurt Haggman
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. Great screen resolution.  Versatile. Meets expectations.  Nice and light. Should come with a cover.  Overall very good.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Janet Stengel
Reviews.Content: Enjoy my Kindle very much.  So much better than my I pod.  Just wish Adobe flash would work on it.

Reviews.Title: Oh, to have the ability to use the new equipment that is on the market now.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I'm very please with my new kindle, but I am also pleased to have a grand daughter who is more literate on technology than I am. I  especially like the combatability of the kindle with my iPad and computer with the Kindle apps. Mary

Reviews.Title: HDX is the BEST
Reviews.Author: Brian Newton
Reviews.Content: This is the best kindle yet! I had the prior models but HD is so much better. Faster, cleaner, easy to use and a wonderful HD picture, seems like it's 3-D.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Nhuong B. Nguyen "hot man"
Reviews.Content: Very good spend, we use it a lot for movie, reading books, check internet, it is worth the money smile

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire....two thumbs up
Reviews.Author: Blessedmomof4
Reviews.Content: Absolutely, love our kindle fire!!! They graphics and colors are amazing!!! It really performs! It's a great value at the price, and a wonderful product.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Bish
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX.  Am so glad I went for it.  It's so versatile.  I can read, play games, watch shows/movies, check email, etc.  It has become my new best friend.  If you are waffling on the purchase, go for it!  You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Better Than Expected - and I expected a lot
Reviews.Author: MAK
Reviews.Content: What can I say!  The sound and picture quality on this device are so excellent that for personal viewing, why would I ever want to use ear phones.  I have an IPad mini, and a Kindle Paperwhite, and while I still prefer reading on the Paperwhite, the Kindle HDX is a wonderful little device for everything else, but especially for viewing movies, tv shows, and the sound quality is so excellent, I convinced my husband to buy one too (because I wasn't going to share mine).  He uses his with a net gear appliance to project his screen onto the TV for movies and shows, to hear music, and he also uses it to read audio books.  He also loves his as much as i love mine, and it is particularly useful for him as he is losing his eyesight.  The brightness and contract on the screen enables him to use the device even though it is small, and he uses his IPad Air less and less as the smaller HDX is easier to see.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: wens4games
Reviews.Content: I switched from Nook and I am not disappointed. The genre of books I read are released on Amazon immediately.  I have used the May day feature once and the technician was helpful.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer sportsman
Reviews.Content: I've never had a tablet before, and I definately chose the right one. Since getting my kindle fire hdx in December, I've read 21 books on it! I can honestly say I'm in love :)

Reviews.Title: Glad i bought it
Reviews.Author: tim mcgraw
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy it.  I do a lot of reading on it and I can travel with it and have every thing I need right there.  great little pad.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Diane Brant
Reviews.Content: I like my Kindle but am still learning how to use some of the programs.  Wish I had a manual to explain some of the basics to me. The games are fun. Haven't tried to read a book yet.

Reviews.Title: Great, amazing, and I love to read
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: First of all I would recommenced this to anyone wanting to buy an e-reader. It has everything from books, to apps, and it is clear and precise on the books. The books are not to expensive, and you can download other reader apps for this product.I chose this because I didn't traditionally like to read, but with this, I can find what I want and it is either inexpensive, or free. What a joy.The best thing about the product is the price, it isn't cheap, but it isn't something that takes a fortune to buy.

Reviews.Title: My KIndle Fire
Reviews.Author: donitalouise
Reviews.Content: I debated on a Nook, a Kindle HDX, or an Acer little notebook.  Everyone had different ideas.  Of course my daughter said Ipad is the only way.  My computer guy kept telling me to get the Kindle Fire.  He knows me and all of my computers.  O got the Kindle.  Told him and he smiled.  I love it. I have an iphone and two desktop PC's and we also have a laptop.  This is for a toy JUST FOR ME.  I like the display and it is easy to operate.  Except....when I took it to the beach and opened the cover, I didn't see a way to connect to the hotel's wi fi.  My phone did and our laptop did but mind showed me a keyboard and asked for a pin????  I don't have a pin.  Never did.  Never given the choice.  So I had to come home and wipe out all of my information and start from the beginning.  I luckily didn't have a lot to replace but I am going to take it away from my wi fi signal soon and just see what happens. There must be an easy way but the woman I was speaking to was obviously from another country with perfect English but didn't exactly know how to tell me why that happened. Other than that.....I would buy one again. And recommend it too.

Reviews.Title: still figuring it out
Reviews.Author: joanne medeiros
Reviews.Content: It has its uses but it is not as handy as I thought it would be the Silk system drops pages often and once I have all my questions written down will be using mayday button a lot wish it was simpler to use no folders for bookmarks and the apps I have down loaded don't for the most part do what they say they will also does not seem to support adobe or at least that is what it tells me have not figured out how to find things in cloud that I have stored. Actually it makes me feel like I need a dummies book to work it

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Connie M. Brandon "connie6005"
Reviews.Content: I like my Kindle Fire HDX very well and does all I need it to do.  I am a sitter at the hospital and it works well for what I need it to do.  And with my Prime, I can do most anything and much cheaper.  I love the borrow books on it but I think the borrow books should be 2 a month instead of one.

Reviews.Title: LOVE, LOVE!!!
Reviews.Author: May
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough good things about this Kindle! I recently had a loooong day of traveling, which included long boring flights and layovers. My Kindle kept me from getting bored and time flew on the plane! (no pun intended) Seriously, I downloaded a bunch of free movies and I was good to go! Everyone should own a Kindle!!!

Reviews.Title: My wife loves it.
Reviews.Author: Jcrunk
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my wife. So far she loves it. Its easy to use, small enough to carry around and we have had no issues with it. The screen is awesome and the resolution shows every detail. Its even easy enough for my  3y/o daughter to turn on cartoons to watch if she wants.Before I bought this I saw some people complaining about the faint blue border when viewing white screens. For us it hasn't bothered us in the least. It's so faint its hard to even tell its there unless you look for it and it hasn't been a distraction at all. My only complaint would have to do with some of the game apps my daughter uses. One of them won't let you change the volume unless you exit the game, but this could be caused by the app itself not the kindle. I would definitly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Carlin Lau
Reviews.Content: Awesome device. I love all the Kindle Fire devices including the Kindle reader. The best part about the Kindle devices is the excellent customer service.

Reviews.Title: Fun
Reviews.Author: Katy
Reviews.Content: If I had to use one word to describe the Kindle Fire HDX7 I would call it Fun.  It is easy to use and the vibrant color display is just another bonus.  I bought it for my husband for Christmas because he has a hard time logging in and out of my laptop and the size and ease of use is perfect for him.  He can happily check shop on ebay and amazon with ease now.  And the mayday button works exactly as described.  I would buy another one

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: melody
Reviews.Content: this was bought as a gift and the person really likes it. connects to wifi really fast and has great content

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I really like my Kindle and enjoy the convenience, but I do not like the connection port.  The plug that goes into the Kindle is slanted and takes several tries to get it plugged in correctly.  That is why I did not give 5 stars.  The actual Kindle is great and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX!!!
Reviews.Author: Lori Majors
Reviews.Content: Got my kindle fire for Christmas. I have used it quite a bit now and would recommend it to many. I have downloaded books, browsed the internet,  do facebook, taken pictures, and downloaded a texting app.  I have done all of this with little or no difficulty considering I am not very tech savvy and do not have a cell phone. The only  negative I have about the kindle fire HDX is adobe flash player is not available for this or any newer device, but haven't really missed it that much. A lot of things from youtube will still stream, as upgrades are made.  Some videos from Facebook play while others do not, but if it is something I really want to see I look on my laptop. All in all, I love my new Kindle Fire HDX.

Reviews.Title: Love it, but…..
Reviews.Author: Caryn
Reviews.Content: The complaints regarding a flickering screen and the blue/purple haze around the edges that I read about before purchasing, unfortunately have also held true with the one I purchased and received….i've read four books on my kindle since purchasing and the blue haze around the edges is definitely noticeable, especially when reading in a dark room.  I don't know if it's worth returning…since its not strictly an e-reader (one can do many other things on the kindle other than read…all of which are fun, interactive and are not afflicted with the blue haze border…if it was just an e-reader and it had the blue/purple haze that would be a deal breaker) it doesn't make the book too hard to read, but its distracting, and certainly puts a strain on the eyes.  The flickering screen also creeps up from time to time when I'm playing different apps (candy crunch app is when I usually see it…all the candies flicker like someones turning a light on and off).  It lasts only a few seconds then stops…these things I think are what keep this good tablet from being a great tablet.  Amazon needs to address the issues.  Other than that, I love it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Rachel J
Reviews.Content: I got this for my father for Christmas. Best gift I could have invested in. It has similar qualities to an Ipad but for a 1/4 of the cost. Highly recommended

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" is a Big Bang for your Buck
Reviews.Author: Bert
Reviews.Content: I find the Kindle HDX 7" so much better than my first version.  The features and the clarityof the display are great and the price is just right.  I love my Kindle and I always take it with me.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Dianne Wildman
Reviews.Content: I use my Kindle all the time.  It is so easy  to use.  I like all the features available.  Love the books.  The screen is so easy to read

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Michael E. Jennnings
Reviews.Content: Just received Kindle Fire, still getting to know it.  I love that I can read my Kindle books and search the web from one device.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Kathy L. Scholl "Katlyn100"
Reviews.Content: I've bought 6 Kindles, starting with the very first generation -- I have three Kindle Fires and love this one the best.  I got a 32GB this time because I ran out of app space on my 16GB.  I also got one for my granddaughter.  This model boots up faster than the others and is so light, even when in a case, that I hardly notice it's in my purse.  I couldn't live without it!

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Woodsman
Reviews.Content: Bought two and pleased with them.  Wife and granddaughter each have one and they absolutely love them.  Bought without annoying popups or ads.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Sandra Hatcher
Reviews.Content: This is my first e-reader/tablet.  I've found the Fire HDX to be very easy to understand and use.  I ordered the 32 gb so I could load my music and book library and still have room for apps and movies.  Even with everything loaded, I still have a lot of room and the speed is still incredibly fast.  I've used the Mayday button a few times and have had excellent help from the CSRs that have answered.  Overall, I'm really happy with my purchase and would recommend this tablet to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Don't know how I lived before Kindle
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: Amazing access to Amazon products, simple user interface and a great battery life. I love this thing to the end of the earth and back.

Reviews.Title: it is a wonderful and easy to use kindle
Reviews.Author: linda murchison
Reviews.Content: fabulous  and my friend purchased after she saw mine and she too is thrilled, i am  getting one for my mom

Reviews.Title: Kindle convert
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: The screen is illuminated beautifully. I also love the page layout. I have the same books on my mini-IPad and time and again Kindle has the pages that are easier on the eye. I love this device!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: I picked out this Kindle because of it's star rating. I am having a very hard time setting something's up, and understand something's, It would be so much nicer if this would of came with a manual. The camera just blow's my mind all I am doing is taking picture's of myself, I did not understand how I can take a picture of anything else, don't have a clue on how to delete them, have no idea on how to delete the free e-book's after I have read it. I would highly recommend this to someone that has knowledge of a mobile device. Since this being  my first mobile and without some kind of manual it is making it harder for me. Since I wrote this review I have found if you go to Amazon.com you will find a video on the Kindle and also information on operating different things. Hopefully in time I will know be able to understand more about this mobile device.

Reviews.Title: wonderful choice in reader
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Terrific little reader.  I am constantly amazed by the features and the clarity of the screen. Some reviews find the blue line disturbing.  I had to remind myself to look for it the first few times I used the kindle.  I am very happy that these reviews did not stop me from this purchase. The sound quality is amazing.  However, I did find the "selfie" photo a little disturbing--the photo is so clear every line and wrinkle is enhanced.  I just avoid self photos.

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE HDX
Reviews.Author: Thomas Hiday "HIDAYROZE"
Reviews.Content: MY WIFE LOVES HER NEW KINDLE FIRE HDX,NOW SHE HAS ALL HER E-BOOKS BACK ON HER TABLET AGAIN TO SEE WHAT SHE HAS READ.ALSO, LOVE THE WIFI IN THE NEW KINDLE. WOULD DEFINATELY RECOMMEND EVERYONE GET ONE OF THESE TABLETS. ALSO, LOVE AMAZON.COM A GREAT PLACE TO SHOP.AND AGAIN THANK YOU FOR SUCH FAST SERVICE.

Reviews.Title: Hallejuh !!
Reviews.Author: Ray Cartwright
Reviews.Content: After many efforts with PCs e readers etc. I saw the ad for kindle with may day and so far its what a dinosaur like I neededI don't know how you got the staff all of whom so far have made the use of kindle funThough I am proceeding slowly I have an inquisitive mind and plan to do my best to reap the benefits

Reviews.Title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Tonja Booth "Tonja R. Booth"
Reviews.Content: I had the Kindle 3G/WiFi keyboard, and I really love it when I got it.. I recently got the Kindle Fire HDX and I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!!  the picture on it is crystal clear, as well as the magazines. It is very easy to navigate. I was truly impressed that all my books from my old Kindle synced to the new one.  So glad that i finally purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Gift
Reviews.Author: Peter Dunklin
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire HDX was the gift of the year.  My spouse is really enjoying it, a lot more than the IPAD.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Billy Sheene
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my Kindle Fire HDX 7".I can do everything on it that I do on my laptop!Reading books on it is amazing.The color and clarity have to be seen to believe!!!I would advise anyone looking for a tablet to check out the Kindle Fire HDX.You will be pleasantly surprised with the price and the tablet!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: Bill O'Neal
Reviews.Content: The Kindle does everything I would want in a tablet.  However, I am a casual user of technology.  I feel it is not necessary to have all the things available, but to have only what is needed.  My education is in technology and that is why I only use what I need, and the Kindle HDX has been great.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Mark D Smith
Reviews.Content: Gave this to my wife for Christmas, she loves it! She's in Australia right now using it. Great item, great price

Reviews.Title: loving it
Reviews.Author: Tanya Potvin "tpot"
Reviews.Content: I love it I wish there was a rear facing camera. I would give it 5 stars otherwise.  Easy to use and fast.

Reviews.Title: Pretty cool
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: enjoy my little gadget always works and even more features just wonderful i love reading books in general ! !

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX!!!
Reviews.Author: mel377
Reviews.Content: I gave up a company I-Pad I never could get to function how I am use to .. I am a PC not an Apple person.  After researching reviews done in Nov. 2013 I was ready to choose it over a Samsung or Surface Tablet.  I can do everything more efficiently now and with more confidence at customer's home and in my home depot stores.  Adobe Reader allows me to type and signature order forms, I can save them in folders (I-Pad doesn't know what a folder is and I needed them to organize) I can ATTACH things to an email to send (I hated not being able to attach files to I-Pad's emails it always embedded them) I can access Dropbox with WM Cloud App, I use Office Suite Pro for opening Word, Excel, and Power Point type documents, I have music, photos etc on it .. it's everything I needed it to be. SO glad I changed. The battery has been fine for me .. I can go about 1 week without recharging it, however I don't live on it constantly and watch a bunch of movies etc. I turned off or down anything I found out drains the battery and I have been pleased. I have a car charger too anyway. All in all it's a great buy.

Reviews.Title: I don't know what I did before it..
Reviews.Author: Victoria k McGregor-good
Reviews.Content: I hate that I can't change the back round and save screen. My calendar doesn't work and hasn't since I got it..

Reviews.Title: Need like 5 more
Reviews.Author: AlaskaHunter2001
Reviews.Content: This thing is AMAZING!  Having just one in the house though is a mistake.  Need to get at least 3 more.  LOL!

Reviews.Title: Will buy the next one that comes out
Reviews.Author: Carlos Cruz
Reviews.Content: To let u guys know how great kindle is. I'm still leaning to use it fixers but getting better. Love it

Reviews.Title: kindle fire HDX is great
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: This is the first tablet I have bought and used and I'm totally satisfied with it. It is a perfect size and I got the origami cover which is great. I am so happy that I bought this item.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: The graphics are wonderful but I am having a lot of issue with the sensitivity of the touch screen.  A lot of times you touch it repeatedly and nothing happens.  Also during certain games the screen flashes repeatedly.

Reviews.Title: Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Daniel  Nieves
Reviews.Content: The volume and on/off controls on the back takes away one star from the product.The experience of having to access the controls on the back, takes a little getting used to.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: donwhu
Reviews.Content: i love it but i should have gotten the bigger oneit's fastbeautiful colorswhat else can i say

Reviews.Title: not android
Reviews.Author: Samuel C. Delore II
Reviews.Content: its a nice machine, but dosent do what I needed. I returned this item and was given a quick credit

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: dean boucher
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift. She loves it and it works perfectly! The display is is sharp and much clearer than other tablets.

Reviews.Title: best presant
Reviews.Author: ann allen
Reviews.Content: wrong box but get help when needed would and have told others about Amazon. Very nice picture quality and easy to use

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Keith H.
Reviews.Content: I love this it does so much more then my last Kindle .  The graphics and quick response are awesome.

Reviews.Title: best thing ever
Reviews.Author: Mattie
Reviews.Content: Got it as a gift, can't believe how wonderful it is. Amazing clear screen easy to follow steps and awesome to travel with.

Reviews.Title: The best ever!
Reviews.Author: Ashley D.
Reviews.Content: In love. Completely. It has such high graphics and amazing speed. Amen to this little gadget!!! I will use it everyday!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Mysti'sMom
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this Kindle edition! I particularly enjoy the voice recognition typing feature, although it took a bit of getting used to, having to speak punctuation!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: GT ACE "Say something about yourself!"
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle and just love it! These are wonderful devices. I also own a Samsung Note 8, several iPads and have several other tablets as well. Each of my devices seems to fit a particular niche and I very much like them as well. Some tablets are better a certain things and have access to different media so rather than moan about what one tablet will do or not do, I have bought several of the best tablets that between them, gives me everything I want

Reviews.Title: Great features but small screen - git the 8.9" instead...
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Short and sweet: I returned this for the 8.9" and am MUCH happier. For an extra $150 and you get a much bigger screen.  Don't be pennywise and pound foolish as the saying goes. Great tablet, but again the 7" screen doesn't cut it.

Reviews.Title: Love the HDX!
Reviews.Author: S. Koenig
Reviews.Content: So glad I purchased this Kindle Fire HDX 7"!  I was previously using my cellphone to check my email and Facebook several times a day.  This Kindle makes it so much easier to read the posts! ....and I love the colors and depth to the pictures.

Reviews.Title: Very Clear Screen
Reviews.Author: hivirgie
Reviews.Content: It took some time getting used to from android and ipad but I would definitely recommend this to anyone interested.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Lily
Reviews.Content: I bought this as an all purpose tablet, but i did not realize how much I would enjoy it. My daughter uses the FreeTime feature to practice math and spelling, and the toddlers want the peek a boo barn app. I use it to read. I watch movies on netflix. Email app is easier to navigate than a pc. Light so you can take it anywhere and slim so I can hide it from the kids when I need to. My favorite feature is the May day button. You press it and minutes later you are talking to a human being!

Reviews.Title: My first Kindle, LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Rachel Doden
Reviews.Content: This is my first Kindle so I have nothing to really compare to but I just love it. The picture is awesome, it's super fast and it's just so pretty. My only problem with it is you can only take selfies with it (and I'm not too big on selfies), but I knew that before I bought it. I love, love, love my new Kindle HDX and if you are considering purchasing it, DOOOOOOO IT!! You won't regret it!! (and it comes FULLY CHARGED!!!)

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Julie Zieman
Reviews.Content: This is my first time with a tablet.  Have a lot to learn but I'm getting the hang of it.  Hate to say this but my grandchildren can work it better than me so I guess they will show me the ropes!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Not your typical user
Reviews.Author: David Browning
Reviews.Content: I own several Kindles ranging from basic readers to variations of the HD/HDX. Some of these devices I use as Amazon intended; others are modified to suit specific needs/interests. From a hardware perspective the HDX is outstanding and an attractive alternative to the Nexus 7 if you don't need GPS, NFC or wireless charging. On smaller tablets I prefer the Kindle form factor as I find it easer to hold in any orientation without worrying about accidental screen touches/activations. When purchased I assumed root access and perhaps an alternative ROM would eventually be needed. Turns out a different launcher (Apex or Nova) and a few side loaded apps from 1Mobile were all that was required. Didn't even need to root my HDX which technically voids Amazon's warranty. The "Mojito" operating environment is more flexible than earlier Amazon/Fire ROMs; most Android apps run perfectly with exception to the Play store (admittedly a biggie) and some Google creations. I can live without those. And I still have easy access to Prime movies and a few native Amazon apps that I happen to prefer. With minimal time and effort my HDX makes an excellent Android tablet that still leverages the best Amazon has to offer.

Reviews.Title: Great Product.
Reviews.Author: exmptle
Reviews.Content: I took this on a trip recently.  It was very handy for following the news doing general searches.  Not the best for the various map services.  I found it very easy to connect to the Wi-Fi in each hotel we stayed at.  My only complaint about this product is that it's way too sensitive to touch.  It's hard to scroll through screens without opening something about which you have no interest.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Roger McKee
Reviews.Content: My wife loves it keeps her from having to go to computer everytime she wants something and also loves playing games on it.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Shelby Wells
Reviews.Content: Tha Kindle Fire HDX is one of the best Christmas gifts I ever received. I'm 75 years old and was afraid I would have a hard time understanding it. But it's been such a pleasure, I've picked right up on it. I love it!

Reviews.Title: kindle hdx7
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: I love this product. I use it daily. It's comes in handle for anything you want. I don't have to use my big computer for most things now.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Marion Andrews
Reviews.Content: This is an easy to use reader with the plus of color and games. I bought the paper white kindle for him first but was disappointed in the black and white edition with no other features for almost the same price as the Fire HDX. Bottom line, he loves to read on the paper white as it is easier for his eyes and plays on the Fire!

Reviews.Title: Great gift giving item
Reviews.Author: L. Villa "book hog"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a friend who has really gotten into the use of Tablets. He had an iPad but was curious about my continued fascination with the Kindle as I had the original Kindle Fire, the HD and now the HDX (all of which I am still using).Well, now he knows why. (And a complete no-brainer if you compare the HDX and the other popular one, really.)He loves the Kindle HDX and has completely switched to using it. The portability factor alone (which was my main deal) was a huge plus. He has loaded lots of books on his reading list into it. The clarity of the movies he watches is greatly enhanced (according to him). The ease of downloading everything he wants into it has made him ecstatic as he is a total film buff and the memory capacity of the HDX is greatly increased compared to the iPad price ratio.

Reviews.Title: A Happy Skeptic
Reviews.Author: Schean
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical about purchasing a Kindle.  I'm a big Samsung fan and have recommended the Galaxy Tab and Note to more than just a few family and friends.  However, a really good friend of mine has been using her kindle for a few years now so I thought I'd give it a try.The Kindle Fire HDX is everything she said it was and more.  The display is incredibly brilliant, the sound is great, the battery life is excellent and it has an awesome selection of apps available through Amazon.  Bang for the buck....it's a great deal.  I take it with me everywhere.

Reviews.Title: Better than IPAD!
Reviews.Author: Guy Mitchell
Reviews.Content: My wife has an IPAD and i bought this for academic reasons because I am a graduate student, but this purchase had turned out better than expected. The size of the kindle fire is more convenient as it rest gently in your hands, the great visuals, and awesome price make this a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Great replacement for my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: The HDX functions similar to my smartphone so was easy to acclimate to.  Everything is user-friendly.  Vivd colors on the screen are brilliant and beautiful.  There are differences from my Kindle Fire, and the differences are all improvements.  Happy with this new and improved Kindle Fire HDX 7".

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Teutonic Lady "Victoria"
Reviews.Content: Now I can watch my favorite programs and movies while lying in bed or sitting down, can answer emails, and even surf the net, but the biggest thing that it's done is that I am really reading again.  Should actually get the paperwhite as it would be even easier on the eyes.I have a very nice router, and it's sorely needed if you want to stream movies, and it really works beautifully, but if I were buying it for a friend, I would pay the extra so I could use it anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Granddaughter loves it, but
Reviews.Author: Caroline Ellis
Reviews.Content: My granddaughter doesn't live with me, so I haven't personally used it - she loves it, however, I had to input my credit card information for her to download free apps and I'm not happy about that.

Reviews.Title: Definitely better than iPad
Reviews.Author: Gardenwitch
Reviews.Content: I have both an iPad 2 and just got a Kindle Fire HD.....no contest.  Love the 7" Kindle and the resolution is fantastic.  Wifi is much faster and love the ability to use Android voice input.  Still getting used to the features, but it's fun to explore.

Reviews.Title: Why I love my Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Connie S. Gray
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX, it is easy to use and has great graphics.The only issue I have is the front facing camera, a total waste.  It would be better if it were rear facing, then you wouldn't have to struggle to stay out of the picture.But, everything else about the Fire HDX, I absolutely love.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire Oh Yea!
Reviews.Author: barefoot
Reviews.Content: I was hard pressed to give up my new kindle fire 7" hdx, certainly because it was a christmas gift from my wife. But I found out a few things about my phone provider when they wanted me to exchange my kindle fire for their tablet. Not only was i being scammed But was informed later... and was able to get out of it before the very short dead line contract expired. I'm glad very glad in fact that I didn't give up my Kindle Fire or return it. It's very fast and it's all I need. Glad I didn't screw up there. I really like this tablet it's my 1st been following this for awhile and when during christmas if you was a store card holder you could by this shipping free for 179.00 what a deal! wow! no regrets here.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my uses-The Kindle Fire has reinvented its best with the HDX
Reviews.Author: Swtbear13
Reviews.Content: I had the Kindle fire for about a year and a half. I loved it but needed more memory quickly enough. When I saw the new HDX had 64 gb available it had my attention but I was skeptical about how different they could possibly be.Well I am here to tell you that the quality has greatly improved. The screen is noticably more clear when comparing the two. Also the HDX is considerably lighter- so much so that when I put the HDX into a case with a wireless bluetooth keyboard included it was still lighter than my original HD.The sound quality is what I expected and I havent tested the range of the wifi but as of now I have never had a problem with connecting with a wifi signal.Battery life is as advertised and works well for me because I take my HDX to class and type notes for my courses with it.Overall I am thrilled with this product and everyday I try to find new ways to use it!

Reviews.Title: It's Perfect
Reviews.Author: Vnyrdstar
Reviews.Content: All I can say, is I ended up buying TWO the 7" for my son and then the 8"9 for myself. I know people who have Ipads but why pay more for pretty much the same thing. And, I use Amazon for so much more. I also have a dell xps that doesn't fit into my purse. We are so happy with our Kindles we can read, watch and purchase anything, anywhere we want. We wouldn't be caught without them, and we don't have to. Yeah !!

Reviews.Title: Still loving it
Reviews.Author: teee
Reviews.Content: I got my Kindle as a Christmas gift for myself and I have yet to put it down. It's like my cellphone and keys, I take it everywhere, gym, work, out visiting family and friends,

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for a great price
Reviews.Author: CMcInnes
Reviews.Content: My husband uses this Kindle all the time. It's great for surfing the internet, reading and playing games. I'm thinking about buying another one for myself.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: terrance r medlin
Reviews.Content: Best thing ever. I am truly happy with my purchase.  It has exceeded my expectations. I'm glad I bought it

Reviews.Title: Its fantastic
Reviews.Author: Nathan Lueth
Reviews.Content: This device has not only made up for its cost in entertainment but also how fast and smooth it runs is incomparable to anything else I've used

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire is Great!
Reviews.Author: Joan Kerrigan
Reviews.Content: I just love my Kindle Fire! I used to have a Kindle that came out earlier, and I really liked it. But the Kindle Fire has so many more programs to enjoy. I like to read, but sometimes I need a change from reading. Kindle Fire gives me the choice of other activities. Thanks to whoever made the Kindle Fire, and to Amazon for putting it out.

Reviews.Title: So Much More than an E-Reader!
Reviews.Author: K. Normand
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle Fire HDX 7" with 32GB as a replacement for my old Kindle, which had made its way into my son's bedroom, never to reappear (he is an avid reader). I did a LOT of research before I made my purchase and decided that this Kindle was the best fit for me. I was not disappointed!There are a few drawbacks:1. No SD card slot so on-board memory is all you get. This isn't a problem for me, since I don't have a whole lot of apps and cloud storage is available. (LOVE the cloud storage!!)2. Google apps are not supported. Reportedly people have gotten them to work on their Kindle but I wasn't able to get them going. I adapted - I get my Gmail via browser and use an alternate mapping app.3. Battery life isn't quite what I'd like, but manageable.Now for the pros:1. The size and weight is just right. It is comfortable to use - even hours on end like I do2. Clear, sharp images. I was quite impressed by how good things look on the Kindle Fire3. Cloud storage so if you get overloaded with apps or books, you can save them to the cloud for later retrieval4. A wide variety of apps will run on the Kindle Fire, ranging from games to Office apps.Once I got the Kindle Fire, I realized that I'd underestimated how much I'd use it. I not only use it for reading (which I do a lot!), but I also have Skype on it, several games, and a bunch of work-related applications. I use it to do some work-related tasks when it's not convenient to be at my computer. With the apps I've collected, I can do all of my work - even work that requires VPN -  on the Kindle - it's that good!I'll admit that the Kindle Fire is not for everyone. If you are expecting a full-blown tablet, you may not like this. It's total overkill if all you want to do is read books. If you absolutely MUST have the SD card slot or MUST run Google apps, then you should look elsewhere. However, if you are looking to read books and also watch movies or tv, play a few games, and run a few apps, then the Kindle Fire is an excellent choice.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Ann S
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying my new kindle fire. It is very easy to use. I like that you can customize it to your likes and dislikes. Thanks for a wonderfully priced product.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet
Reviews.Author: Dolphinlady695
Reviews.Content: I received this as a gift for Christmas and am on my second one as the first one froze up on me completely after 5 days of use after I installed a puzzle game. I enjoy all the features it has to offer with two exceptions. The first downside is that you can only use Amazon apps and cannot download any games or programs that require flash player as they are not compatible with the device and flash player cannot be installed on Kindle Fire. Secondly, the camera is a big disappointment unless you do nothing but selfies as it does not have a back camera. On the upside it is easy to navigate, the screen colors are very vivid and Amazon does offer a lot of apps, some I just find useless or don't want to install. The Mayday is also a great feature unless your device is completely frozen. Certain games that are currently the rage are available but they are not the same version as the Android, Apple or desktop versions. I would recommend the Kindle for anyone who is an avid reader and doesn't want/need Google Playstore apps as they are not compatible with this device.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Pamela L Potts
Reviews.Content: I really like me Kindle Fire its easy to use and take everywhere, the only thing that drives me nuts is trying to take a picture. What were you thinking, have you tried taking a pic of the sunset over the ocean and if so how did it turn out for you. Its very awkward.

Reviews.Title: Great Device!
Reviews.Author: Travis L. Spencer
Reviews.Content: We own a Nexus 7, which is nice device, but this one beats it.  I am really glad we bought it!

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire HDX, even after a few months
Reviews.Author: Amaris W
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a tablet where I have lots of fun while being able to read any book I choose and immediately purchase.  The Kindle Fire HDX is the perfect device for me. The screen is clear, the device is beautiful, the device is light, and the processing is super fast. Purchasing my Kindle was a perfect holiday treat because I had time to read and play games. The Kindle fire HDX made traveling home for Christmas so much fun (the free TV viewing did not work on my device while on the plane, which was problematic. But I read, listened to music, and played angry birds).The amount of time I now use my laptop has dropped down to only 25%, because this device has everything I need leisure-wise, especially for emails and Facebook. In fact, I prefer to deal with my emails only on my Kindle device. I only go to my laptop if I need to type documents or prepare documents for school and work.The Kindle is great too because it has a voice dictation software already installed which cuts my typing down significantly. This feature is important because with my physical disability, typing can be difficult on any device.I really enjoy this device, and I am glad I got it, instead of an iPad.

Reviews.Title: Not That Intuitive
Reviews.Author: John T. Zipple "CMU Prof"
Reviews.Content: Bought for my wife. She has struggled with the learning curve because there were no instructions that came with the tablet. She likes the instantaneous online support and is amazed at the resolution of the screen and the capacity of the tablet (32GB). She absolutely loves it.

Reviews.Title: Better than the original
Reviews.Author: Josie
Reviews.Content: I purchased my HDX 7" only because my original was stolen. With the new version I didn't know what I was missing. I like having the additional storage of 64GB and the Bluetooth. I did like the heaviness of the original but the slimness is the HDX 7" is sleek. I did get a case and a screen protector because I prefer to protect my investments. I ave it a few months now and the any glitches resemble that of a smartphone so any trouble shooting is resolved but powering off (pressing down for 20 seconds) , waiting 45 seconds and then powering on. So far the device has froze (no response to screen at all) and there was an issue with the volume not responding and no sound came from the device from any option such as music or video. At first I felt like a sell out but getting the HDX 7" w/ Special Offers but I was on a budget and there was a sale. So far the adds don't bother me and I'm have not been offended by any of them. Overall this is a great device and always my first choice for an e-reader/tablet.

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet for the Price
Reviews.Author: Darrell McCarroll
Reviews.Content: Overall, this is an excellent tablet, but it isn't perfect.Pros:Outstanding displayFast processorGreat priceGreat supportAmazon prime videosCons:No GPS or CompassAmazon's ecosystem simply does not have many of the apps I use on other Android devices.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: JoyMo
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle.  Now, I wish I had purchased the larger one.  Was a bit disappointed that I don't have the front and back camera.  I believe that it would be a lot easier to take pictures.  I have a new great-grandbaby and am always taking pictures and I think it would be better if I had gone the distance and gotten the next size.  But all and all I do love this Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Nice Product for the Price
Reviews.Author: Angela Smallwood
Reviews.Content: Beautiful display; especially for watching movies.  Sufficient battery life for my needs. Keep on charge when not in use and ready when I need.

Reviews.Title: First Tablet
Reviews.Author: T. E. Roth
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying having a tablet.  If I was to do it over again I may have picked up the 8.9" version.  Otherwise this product is great!  There are a few financial apps that are not compatible with the tablet that are compatible with my other smart phones. I'm glad it has the swype to text feature big plus over the Apple keyboard(4S).Reading is easy on the eyes the glare sometimes fools you though.Id like to have a home button to use because the side bar feature sometimes gets in the way of using an app.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Christina Rardin
Reviews.Content: I love it.  Easy to use, lots of apps, light weight, and the screen is very clear.  You should really get a case for it because it is really thin.

Reviews.Title: wait before you buy
Reviews.Author: Travis T. Foss
Reviews.Content: Wait before they improve it before you buy. First, it doesn't have many apps you probably want. My bank app isn't available (capital one).  No YouTube app. No podcast player app. My favorite game app doesn't make them for the kindle. No decent weather apps are available. Second, you are stuck with the kindle browser, Silk. No chrome, Firefox, atomic, or safari. Silk is an ok browser but it doesn't handle embedded video very well. Lots of freezing and unexpected hangs. Bookmarks are awkward. Third, the touch screen is glitchier than my iPad. The cursor jumps around randomly. Good luck getting the cursor to go where you want it to when typing. Fourth, it's not easy to switch between apps. The OS stores everything in memory and the performance suffers if you use too many apps, and there's no way to close the ones you aren't using. I found myself shutting it down and restarting frequently. Fifth, a big selling point was the "one free rental book a month" deal with the kindle. But the selection is SMALL and it's impossible to search the lending library. Amazon sells the "lending library" hard, but it's clear it's not ready for primetime. Finally, some of my favorite websites are slow and glitchy with the silk browser (like slate).  The browser often hangs for no reason, even when my broadband is working fine.More rrestarting.

Reviews.Title: It was a gift for my mom, but I love it too....
Reviews.Author: Cujodu
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my mom, and a replacement for her original kindle.  But let me tell you why it's amazing for a 70-year-old... the button that brings up the Amazon rep to take care of any problems.  If every electronic device had that button I would never again have to fix my mom's computer, iPod, telephone, or etc. problems.  That would be heaven.

Reviews.Title: Overal disappointed.
Reviews.Author: drachehexe
Reviews.Content: I got this because my Android phone's screen was too small for reading and some gaming and note taking.  This is great for reading and web-surfing, in games tho the menu tab in full screen games gets in the way a lot of the time, especially the hidden object games where the tab can cover something you need to click on preventing you from progressing.I also don't like the limitations of setting up your home screen.  There is VERY little customization, my android phone is much more user interface friendly, this, this is just messy.If you can manage through the funky menu system it's a good device, good reader, good gamer, good surfer, just lousy interface, not overly user friendly at all.

Reviews.Title: Very nice tablet.
Reviews.Author: Dan R. Mason
Reviews.Content: This tablet is an upgrade from my 7 inch Kindle Fire HD. I think this tablet is great with just one negative. I prefer the speakers at the end of the tablet like on the old Kindle Fire HD. However, this tablet is so much faster and with the 64 GB of storage I can do so much more.

Reviews.Title: Xmas Gift for My Wife
Reviews.Author: Myron B.
Reviews.Content: I only have used it once, but my wife is on it all day long.  We are a five Kindle household (of 2) and this Kindle is the best to date.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 7"
Reviews.Author: Alvin C. Fogelman "onlineshopper"
Reviews.Content: I have found this to be very convenient for traveling. It is so much less bulky. for transporting. My only regret is that I couldn't afford to purchase the 8" at the time.

Reviews.Title: kindle review
Reviews.Author: Dolly
Reviews.Content: I absolutely loved my original kindle fire,but the kindle fire HDX is amazing,the graphics are so clear.I compared it to the picture on my original kindle and there is a big difference.the May day feature is a life saver for someone who doesn't know how to do very much on a computer.the people who answer your call are wonderful,they are so patient and knowledgeable.lts a great machine,I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed.
Reviews.Author: pjhempe2
Reviews.Content: I really like the smaller size from my iPad, however am very disappointed in the camera. I had hoped I would be able to use it to take pictures and video as well as use it for video chat. I returned it and most likely not get the 8.9 because it is not as compact.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: mary
Reviews.Content: Really enjoy it. Love getting free Prime streaming videos. Enjoying Downtown Abbey for the first time. Also love Fashioning and web surfing on it.

Reviews.Title: my Kindle!!!
Reviews.Author: Sharon Colburn
Reviews.Content: I just love, the color and graphics are excellent. Not sure still how to use everything yet, but I'll learn.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY KINDLE!!!
Reviews.Author: Shawna
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle, I used to have the Kindle HD but I easily upgraded before my insurance ran out. It's extremely faster now, light weight, the screen is amazingly clear. And the battery life is the best I have ever had. Honestly I love my kindle very much, and so does my boyfriend who always take it from me haha. So if you're thinking of this product to read, go online, play games, etc it is perfect! I highly recommend this product to anyone. Not even including the great price for this item, I got it on sale for $199 which made it even better. I'm completely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Best toy ever!
Reviews.Author: Camp Follower "Catriona"
Reviews.Content: My family chose the Kindle Fire HDX 7 over an Ipad mini for my Christmas gift and I am so glad they did. The Kindle works intuitively -- I am a Baby Boomer and electronics do not come easy to me, but the Kindle does. And the special offers make fun screen savers that I ignore or check out at will -- completely non-intrusive.

Reviews.Title: not playing videos
Reviews.Author: trinitechi
Reviews.Content: I thought that I would finally have a convenient way to watch my favourite shows online....I'm yet to be able to see even one episode. They do not play. It works very well for music, reading docucuments and general web page browsing mhm habit video watching I is quite unreliable. I still have to use my slow old computer.

Reviews.Title: FAST AND EASY TO USE  MUCH LIGHTER THAN MY FIRST KINDLE
Reviews.Author: Barbara Moehringer
Reviews.Content: KINDLE #2  FOR ME  LIGHTER THEN MY FIRST KINDLE  AND  THE COLOR IS GREAT  SHARING IT WITH FAMILY IS SUPER EASY

Reviews.Title: Fire
Reviews.Author: jeremiah
Reviews.Content: Got it for gf as Xmas gift. She loves it. Easy to operate and easy to carry with her wherever she goes

Reviews.Title: Never thought I'd want one of these
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Now that I have a Kindle, and an HDX at that, I'm totally sold. I don't have time to read as much as I used to, so I thought having a Kindle would not help me find more time to read, so why buy one? And then I got one for Christmas. I still don't read as many books as I used to, but my Kindle is with me constantly. I love being able to check and send email, interact on my social media accounts, access certain very useful apps, and other activities (including reading short ebooks), during any free moments during the day. Some people would say I'm "too connected" now, but it's the future, and I'm finally joining the action. As a great grandmother, I like being where all my kids are!

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: shari
Reviews.Content: I use it so much. I use it for not only reading but gaming, email, and surfing the net.  My grandchildren love it as well. They play games on it too. I don't use my laptop nearly as much.  I would recommend it as a family gift too.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Renee Marmion
Reviews.Content: I just love it!!! Don't know why I waited so long to get one. It's the best. Again love it.

Reviews.Title: My KIndle
Reviews.Author: Diane O'Neill
Reviews.Content: I especially like the May Day Lady. It was easy to set up.I dont like that I cant have a flash player for video gamesThis version was a little expensive but it comes with adverts.that you can not removeAlso, I would have liked to be able to personalize my wall paper etc.All in all, I am happy with it.I also bought the Office Max kit that "sets it up and down loads everything you need"I took it back. You dont need it. Thats just a rip off

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX, Great Product
Reviews.Author: Ruben W. Thompson
Reviews.Content: This is my second Kindle. I was very pleased with the first Kindle Fire HD. The second Kindle Fire HDX is even better. The only drawback is it has no SIM card slot for GSM, 4G, LTE, or EDGE networks.Good product...

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Seretha Busbee
Reviews.Content: Just perfect size for home or travel.  Wish that I had purchased it sooner.  I have recommended this Kindle to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Works smoothly, and display is beautiful, the panic button is cool but almost no need to use it. Great tablet

Reviews.Title: oh so happy.
Reviews.Author: jane
Reviews.Content: Love my new HDX.  Was really easy to set up and have only hadto ask for help from"media" a couple of times. Did buy two booksfor help tips that were helpful. Camera is really good and Skype somuch fun. Good job on this new HDX.

Reviews.Title: my Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Joan Denman
Reviews.Content: Very pleased!  Works great for what I need. And the Mayday support is beyond perfect. love it. Never have had any problems buying anything from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Sharon Mendenhall
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire.  My daughter gave it to me for Christmas.  I have downloaded any books yet, but plan to in the future.  I love the soft touch.

Reviews.Title: Does what it suppose to do !!!
Reviews.Author: Joseph Corbett
Reviews.Content: Now all you people saying it doesn't do this or that, well it's not suppose to.So for what it was designed to do, it does very well.I read lots of book using Prime, just hope they don't raise the cost of it.I watched movies without an issue, through Amazon, Netflix, Hulu+, ect... no issues there. The dedicated Volume buttons make it a lot better then my prior standard Kindle Fire.Emails, Facebook and other Social Media works without any issues.Web Browser works well, prior Kindle Fire would say need to update web browser, Amazon we need an update on the older Kindle Fire.~Joseph

Reviews.Title: Fire HDX 7
Reviews.Author: Larry W. Arrington
Reviews.Content: I have really enjoyed my Fire HDX in the 7" version. It's easy to hold, eliminating wrist fatigue. And the sound is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Purchased to replace my first Kindle
Reviews.Author: David M
Reviews.Content: Great Kindle...faster than my first one....has great resolution and new operating system...and as usual it has all of the Kindle features and book buying power

Reviews.Title: What a fantastic unit !
Reviews.Author: KatsRule
Reviews.Content: I loved my first generation kindle fire...and just wanted the better display and sound that I read about in reviews.I am so happy I decided to buy this light weight product...that is so easy to carry...I take it to work in my lunch bag everyday. It is so nice to use the free wifi at the college I go to as a worker....and share the movies in HD content and loud sound..often I haveseveral fellow employees watching over my shoulder ..and I have to just laugh each time. We all enjoy this productsfeatures..crisp clear high definition video and fast wifi play down...(playdown means it does not skip in the wifi, always giving a constant uninterrupted video right off a fast speed internet..  I use wifi...).I actually bought two units.  .  . and both my wife and I sit almost all night playing free downloaded games from the Amazon App Store...and we are simply GLUED to these tablets.  Our best apps include.. The weather channel..Amazon free App Games...our outside home security cameras...(which I can view anywhere at anytime in the world on this unit)...  I love how where ever I go..if there is free wifi near me..the kindle fire hdx  automatically connects with my permission...and I zoom off to never never land onto the internet/movies/weather conditions/local and world news.  I simply just LOVE this Kindle Fire HDX 7" Display, Wi-Fi , 16 GB - Included Special Offers.  WE LOVE IT !

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Cari

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"

Reviews.Title: Kindle

Reviews.Title: I love this device

Reviews.Title: My Kindle does everything!

Reviews.Content: I am in love with my HDX. My Husband purchased a fire for me as a birthday gift almost 2 years ago and I wanted to purchase the Kindle Fire for our Daughter for Christmas.  I got her the HDX and fell in love with it so I kept it!

Reviews.Title: Great !!

Reviews.Title: Awesome

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire!!!

Reviews.Content: I am an avid reader and always said I wouldn't get a Kindle because I like to goto my local library. I received one for Christmas and couldn't be happier. Now Iwill go to the library and read my Kindle!

Reviews.Title: Kindle wins

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX 7

Reviews.Title: It's Great

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX 7 is awesome
Reviews.Author: Shawn Muder
Reviews.Content: Love this tablet.  I thought my first gen Kindle Fire was good, but this one makes it look like an abacus.  So far, I have had little problems with the Kindle.  Only issue is a little screen flicker when reading a book which was significantly reduced when I turned auto-brightness back on.  I love the sharp screen, the X-ray bonus features from IMDB is also nice, since when watching a show or movie I often wonder who is playing who, especially when it's not a main character.  The improved 'carousel' and apps screen is also a nice improvement.

Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle Fire

Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire is allot of fun!! It has exceeded my expectations. It is very easy to use. As always Amazon delivered as promised.

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE  HDX IS NOT AN APPLE
Reviews.Author: MontanaOutdoorsman
Reviews.Content: The screen is sharp and clear, so it is great for reading and watching you tube videos. The reason I only gave it  4 stars is some of the features that come with it don't work as they should. The first one that comes to mind is the speech to text. It works very sporadic. One in three times it will work. What I do like is when it does work it's pretty accurate as far as words. I guess I am somewhat disappointed because we have an IPad and there is no comparison between the two. (In my opinion anyway) the iPad is a lot easier to navigate around on, speech to text always works as well. The touch sceen on the iPad also works a lot smoother and is more accurate. They say the android system is getting the bugs worked out and works as well as Apple.  I have to disagree, because of having both I can do side by side comparisons, and everything I have tried the winner is clearly Apple. If you can afford it the iPad is two times the machine. My opinion only.

Reviews.Title: cool

The Silk browser is a huge leap forward from the Kindle Fire and is very fast and responsive. The only con I have found so far is in the native e-mail application.  It works extremely well but it does not have a "select all" option when you need to move or delete e-mail, you have to select each one individually.  This is a minor quibble but would make the mail app shine (yes I know I have other options).  Now if I could just convince my significant other that the HDX 8.9" would be even better (or the 10" when it becomes available...)

Reviews.Author: Russell Ankele
Reviews.Content: Not very happy with the Kindle Fire HDX 4G. After signing up for 3 gb of data from AT&T; the kindle kept saying "invalid sim" at the top. After talking to amazon customer support (who is very easy to get ahold of) I had to take it to AT&T; for a replacement sim. That did not fix the problem. Amazon did send a new one 2 day shipping. So everything should be good, but no. The new kindle will still go offline here and there saying invalid sim. Since I bought it for my girlfriend and she says she can live with it, I'm not going to go though the trouble of having to return it again. Also since I was unable to use it until the replacement came and the data connect 30 day period had started, it seems like I lost about 10% of my planned data period. All in all my girlfriend is happy with the Kindle Fire HDX, but I will be purchasing an iPad for myself.

Reviews.Title: Love Love Love!

Reviews.Title: AMAZING TABLET (5 STARS INDEED!)
Reviews.Author: ThunderBow98 "Daniel"
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX is surely an amazing device. Its fast, lightweight & portable, has an ever-growing selection of apps, and a BEAUTIFUL 7" display. To show what this tablet is like, I will be comparing the HDX to the iPad Air(NOTE: these opinions come from a hardcore Apple user who is trying out Android-based tablets. I'm not being biased)»» Contrary to what most people believe, the HDX is actually better than the Air. For starters, the iPad air base model is $499... the HDX on the other hand, is $229. Its $270 for a tablet that isn't as powerful.»»Speaking of power, let's take a look at the specs of the devices. The HDX has a 2.2 GHZ quad core Snapdragon processor + 2 GB of RAM. Thats more power and speed than most tablets on the market. The iPad Air has a dual core 1.3 GHz processor with only 1 GB of RAM. So clearly the HDX is way faster»»The display on the HDX isn't as big as the iPad Air, despite being "HD". The HDX has a 1920x1200 display, and the iPad has a 1536x2048 display. HOWEVER, the pixel density isn't as high on the Air. The Air has about 264ppi and the HDX has 323ppi. So, although the display on the HDX isn't as HD, higher pixel density means sharper & clearer images. In terms of which is better, this one is really a toss-up.»»The camera on the HDX is absolutely terrible compared to the one on the iPad air... at least on the 7" model. The 7" HDX lacks a rear-facing camera, and the front facing camera isn't too spectacular. Bump up to the 8.9" HDX and you have an 8 MP rear camera that rivals the Air's 5 MP camera. If you're going for the 7" tablet and the camera is the deciding factor, go with the Air. It has a better camera.»»Battery life is HUGE when comparing the tablets. The HDX is really good at conserving power. Amazon claims the HDX has up to 11 hours of battery life, and that really holds true. I myself have gotten even more than 11 hours of battery life. The iPad Air is a different story. Although Apple claims to have up to 10 hours of battery life, iOS 7 is a huge battery killer. I would be lucky to get half that amount with average use. I have a feeling that if iOS 7 was fixed to be less battery consuming, the Air would win this battle. So this is yet another win for the HDX»Aesthetics & looks: Apple is known for its amazing product build quality and sleek look. The iPad wins this one hands down. It has a finished aluminum case that comes in two colors: Gray and Silver. The Air is also really thin & lightweight + it has small bezels allowing for more room for your content. It overall feels really solid. The HDX, though has a fairly sturdy build, is made with materials that look rather cheap. It has a rubbery-material back + is made with plastic... not aluminum. Although the HDX is also really thin & light, the iPad wins this one, simply because it looks nice.»»App selection & software: The Amazon Appstore continues to grow, and certainly has thousands of more apps than it did when it first opened. But nothing can beat Apple in this category. The Amazon AS is rather limited. Its different from Google Play, which has much more to select from. Apple's AS has a huge variety of apps... overall a great selection. Amazon is just way too limited at this point in time. Also, iOS 7 is much nicer & has way more features than Fire OS 3. Fire OS takes the stock Android and modifies it to the point that it just looks terrible. You can't change backgrounds, you have very little customization, and the gray, drab colorless home screen & menus really don't help. Another hands down win for Apple.Overall, the HDX beats the Air in terms of speed, power, price & battery life. However, if you want a tablet that has more app selection, a nicer-looking OS, a good camera, and a really solid build that is aesthetically appealing, get the iPad Air. Below I have ranked the Kindle HDX in terms of all of the above categories. I hope this review has helped you! If it did, please "Up Vote" this review! Thank you!Price (8/10)Power/Speed (9/10)Display (8/10)Camera (3/10)Battery Life (10/10)Aesthetics & Looks (3/10)App Selection & Software (4/10)OVERALL SCORE: 7/10

Reviews.Title: Nice Device but not living up to advertising copy
Reviews.Author: Jim Diestel
Reviews.Content: Don't get me wrong, I like the Kindle Fire HDX; however, it does not deliver on advertised claims.One feature is the ability to switch between audible and read books.  I envisioned reading a book, hoping in my car to commute to work listening and going back to reading later in a seamless process.  Much more complicated and I am not talking about the doubling of cost of downloaded books having the ability to do this.A side issue is that the HDX doesn't interface to my car audio system with a MP3 plug forcing me to play the HDX in the car through the devices speaker.  Just can't crank volume high enough to overcome road noise.

Reviews.Title: Sooo many improvements!
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: This is a great new Kindle! I have the Original Kindle Fire, which I love. But this new one is so much easier to use, so much more user-friendly! My husband has an i-Pad and this is very similar. I love the size (it fits easily in my purse!) and the clarity of the picture is amazing! I have it in a rooCase which puts it to sleep when I close it....very handy.The games play a lot faster and email is so simple to use; I used my "old" kindle to pick up email when we travelled, but it was not a simpe job. This new one notifies you when there's new email and is much more like my laptop to use! Very nice upgrade and will be great for travelling!My only "complaint" (not really) is that I have to start my games all over again! The levels I achieved on the old Kindle are not saved! Maybe that's a good thing though because now I have the games on both Kindles (they download themselves--mega easy!) and can play the level I feel like at any moment! Oh, I have the one with the ads and wish I had the non-ad version, FYI. Some of the little ads at the bottom flash, etc. and are very distracting. Some people said they actually like the ads but I feel they interfere with what I'm doing. I don't mind the full-page ones that you just "close" but those flashing ones are very annoying.Bottom line: This is a beautiful tablet and I love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!

Reviews.Content: When I bordered the Kindle Fire HDX,  I was using a desktop computer, a laptop, a Kindle Paperwhite, and an Android tablet. It was time to simplify me electronic life. And this has done it all. I love this device. It's sleek, light, fast, clear easy to use, and I have no regrets.

Reviews.Title: Didn't seem to work very well.
Reviews.Author: Drastic
Reviews.Content: I had high hopes for this device because of the specs and the large amount of hype it received Upon using the device it had unprecedented slow-downs/freezups. I tried reloading it and the issue remained. The other issue I was receiving was sometimes the battery life would be great other times it would die in less than 3 hours from a full charge and no use. Note that this would occur regardless of apps running or not. I think my device was faulty so I returned it for a refund.However I can say the following things :The app selection is not great and typically very expensive in-app purchases. The only thing that has a reasonable price tag is Amazons own content ( books etc. )All in all it felt well build and the sound and screen where great.Not recommended for someone looking for a stock android device.

Reviews.Title: INSTRUCTIONAL FLAW
Reviews.Author: thomas a cappelloni
Reviews.Content: I AM NOT TECHNICALLY SAVVY.  I WOULD HAVE NEVER PURCHASED ANY DEVICE LIKE THIS.  IT WAS A GIFT FROM FRIENDS WHO ARE DETERMINED TO DRAG ME INTO THE 21ST CENTURY.  I EMBRACED IT.  I HAVE TRIED TO USE IT, AND HAVE ENJOYED THE THINGS I HAVE BEEN ABLE TO FIND.  THE BIGGEST PROBLEM FOR MYSELF AND MANY LIKE ME WHO CAME THROUGH COLLEGE AND GRADUATE SCHOOL WHEN COMPUTERS WERE HOUSED IN AIR CONDITIONED ROOMS, AND DATA WAS ENTERED ON PUNCH CARDS ---IS--- THERE IS NO USEFUL WAY TO FIND OUT HOW TO USE THE NUMEROUS FACITS OF THIS DEVICE.  THE TUTORIALS ARE VIRTUALLY USELESS.  SO THE DEVICE IS OF LIMITED VALUE TO ME.  I NEED AN INSTRUCTION APP THAT STARTS WITH A PICTURE THAT SHOWS YOU HOW TO TURN IT ON, AND DOES EVERY FUNCTION FROM THAT POINT.  YOUR INSTRUCTIONS ARE GEARED TO PEOPLE WHO HAVE COME UP WITH THIS TECHNOLOGY FROM KINDERGARTEN.  AND SO YOU LOSE AN ENTIRE MARKET BASE AMONG THE 50-70 YEAR OLD PEOPLE WHO WOULD LIKE TO USE A KINDLE, BUT DON'T HAVE GRANDCHILDREN OR GRADE- SCHOOLERS TO GIVE THEM TUTORIALS.

Reviews.Title: Almost there...
Reviews.Author: XJCraver
Reviews.Content: Nice little tablet. Handy for checking emails, forums, and such, and very easy to use.  BUT.....Amazon and Google have GOT to get their heads together, and come up with a way for me (and others) to access the Android apps I've ALREADY PAID FOR in the Play store.  It's ridiculous the amount of functionality you lose not being able to access those apps.  If I could link this thing to my Verizon phone, and have all my Play store apps on this thing, it would've got 4 1/2 stars instead of 3.  Very disappointed that I have to hack this thing to be able to use it to it's potential.  And before you go all "read about it before you buy it" on me - I received this as a gift.  I had no choice in the matter...The other 1/2 star it's lacking is an easy fix, and it flat boggles my mind that Amazon didn't include it in the programming  -  NO HAPTIC FEEDBACK OPTIONS?????????  That's basic, kindergarten-level stuff some programmer left out, and it's beyond annoying.  Really would make this thing much more user-friendly if these buttons gave me some feedback when I touched them.So overall,  3 stars.  I'd be fine with recommending it as a purchase, just do your research first and make sure you can do without your Play Store apps.  And do NOT gift it to someone, unless they're on their knees begging.  There are similarly priced tablets out there that will much better suit the average Android user.

Reviews.Title: Depends on what you want.
Reviews.Author: ann wilson
Reviews.Content: To tell the truth I like my old original Kindle better.  The new Fire is harder to read a book on because of the glare of the pages.  Much prefer the old one's easy on the eyes screen.  I don't like the dictionary at all.  You have to page through from a to z to find the word you want.  Waste of time.  I don't much care for the games that are available.  I like word games.  I play several every day such as crossword and Scrabble on my old Kindle.  The choice of games on Fire are mostly juvenile ones with sound effects which are irritating and most of them will only let you play a game or two without paying the company who created them more money.  On the old Kindle you pay for a game up front and play to your heart's content.  I also don't like how frequently it needs recharging - even when it's just sitting around doing nothing it needs a recharge in no time.  I do like that I can pick up my email without starting up the computer. I can check it while I'm sitting around watching TV, etc.  However, you can't trash the email on your computer from your Fire, so you end up trashing it from the Kindle, then when you get into your computer, the emails are still there and you have to go through the process again..  I also don't like the front only camera.  It's very hard to take a decent picture with it because you can't see what you're focusing on.  Perhaps going up to the next level would have been better, but that was a great deal more expensive.  I'd say this is an okay device if you like to play the games a lot, don't use the dictionary very much, either don't read a lot of books or have young eyes.  But if you have an old Kindle you like for reading, word games , the dictionary and thesauras, stick with the black and white.

The sound quality is good and the size of the tablet is nice as well.  It's built to be dedicated to Amazon services but I uses those services so it fits me fine. Reviews.Title: The best Kindle yet
Reviews.Author: Ronald G. Glover
Reviews.Content: I am a voracious reader, as is my wife.  We each have Kindle E-readers.  She likes her Paperwhite Kindle very much, but when I had one, I did not care for it.  I borrowed my Granddaughter's first generation Kindle Fire and liked it, so bought a first generation Kindle Fire HD.  I liked the concept, but had so much trouble with failures with them (I had and sent back 3 of them), that I got to know the tech support people pretty well.  I kept the last Fire HD I had since it semi-worked.  Finally, however, with much trepidation (and a $50 one day price drop) I purchased the new Kindle Fire HDX.  It has proven perfect.  It has not crashed nor given me blank pages or any of the myriad problems I had with my Fire HDs.I had read of complaints with blue/purple borders on the HDX, but I did not see it with mine.  My wife said she saw a faint blue tinge at the edges, but it was not bothersome.  I use my HDX almost exclusively for reading and I prefer the black background with white printing so blue/purple borders are not an issue anyhow.I think if you have been disappointed with the first generation Fire HD you will be pleased with the HDX, at least as an E-reader.

Reviews.Author: Deb North
Reviews.Content: It's not as easy to use and get aps for as the ipad...also not as many free aps...I hope with more time, I'll get used to it.

Reviews.Title: does the job
Reviews.Author: August
Reviews.Content: So far its good. I wish it had android apps, but good for gaming. Sounds great with dual speakers. Would give it five if it didn't freeze up so far at least six times since Xmas.

Reviews.Title: confusing
Reviews.Author: Joy Carl
Reviews.Content: It's a great tablet, my friends have it and I love playing games on it, but it's horribly confusing. The mayday button helps a lot, but the setup process can be a struggle. After you set it up, though, it's great for hours at a time!

Reviews.Title: I love it but...
Reviews.Author: Melbell
Reviews.Content: I love it but it needs a two way camera. The camera only faces the person looking at the screen. It would also be great if it had a usb port and supported adobe flash player so I could play some of my favorite games. Other than that it is awesome. Amazon has great deals on it also.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Wayne S. Laird "deer hunter"
Reviews.Content: Great product and price. Always someone to help you with any problem you have with it. I will recommend this to everyone.

Reviews.Title: kindlr fire hdx
Reviews.Author: mary j. williams
Reviews.Content: Best thing  did for myself in a long time.  Having lots of fun with it and learning to use with the help features and functionality. Thanks for all the help and making my day brighter. Reading is so much clearer and pictures are fun to show, if I ever get that part down.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Kalen Brown "Kalen~Brown"
Reviews.Content: There's nothing better than the kindle fire HDX!!!!! Great, clear picture and multitasking is terrific! I love it!!! I have the 7.0 and its just a wonderful thing. If your looking for a tablet I highly recommend the kindle fire HDX

Reviews.Title: Love It!!
Reviews.Author: Dustin
Reviews.Content: I received a Kindle HDX for a Christmas present and absolutely LOVE IT! It can do so many more things than I thought it would. My children love to play games on it and it is easy for them to navigate. I read books on it while working out and use it to read bedtime stories to my children for bedtime. It is now my go-to electronic for all my social network needs and for leisure reading. I was reluctant to go this route for books as I am a big time reader and was stuck on wanting a paperback in my hands... I was wrong, I will most likely never go back to traditional books. It keeps your place every time and so easy to read! I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: May day Button
Reviews.Author: maggy
Reviews.Content: This kindle features the May day button.When you click on it ,it says if you prefer you can send a message and it lists an address,l tried that first but was unsuccessful in getting it to work.l then used the on line tech,his name was Chris and very helpful and resolved my problem.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Tyler Kunce
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet.  It is more than capable of handling everything I need of it.  It takes a bit of time to get used to it; but, once you do, it's capable of everything you would ask of an iPad or Surface, in my opinion.  I'm not a huge fan of the advertisements on the lock/security screen, but It's not a huge drawback.

Reviews.Title: Battery life and charging time not really as advertised.
Reviews.Author: Philippe J. Leroy
Reviews.Content: I seem to be having problems extending the useful battery life beyond 6 hours. Also the recharging time seems to be much longer than on my old 1st generation kindle.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Courtney Champy
Reviews.Content: I like the brightness and quality of the display. The speed is pretty good and it is easy to navigate.A very big turn-off is the lack of customization, I like my own backgrounds and now when I am not at home reading I cannot look at my dog which is relaxing and makes reading more enjoyable. Unfortunately the next model may have this but an upgrade that enables this would be phenomenal, as it is an expensive purchase and I cannot investing in the newest version for one change.

Reviews.Title: love my kindle fire
Reviews.Author: staci pullinger
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use! Fast downloads for apps. I would rate it 5 stars.  The clarity and HD are fantastic.

Reviews.Title: A great gitf from the kids for Christmas
Reviews.Author: Susan oleneack
Reviews.Content: I chose four stars because I wish I had asked for the larger version. 7" is just a little too small. Otherwise, I am very pleased with this Kindle version and appreciate the special offers and the mayday button. Great for this baby boomer Mom who isn't as tech savvy as the kids.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: katt 3woman
