Reviews.Title: Much Better Than My Previous Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kyle Young
Reviews.Content: Before I got this I had the Kindle Fire 1st Gen. I got this and have fallen in love with the improvements that have been done to the Kindle Fire. It is lighter than the original fire and works much better in my opinion. It fits the needs I require which are reading, movies, games, and browsing the web. I don't care for all the fancy technical stuff or connecting to TV at really, I'm happy as long as it does what I need it to do.

Reviews.Title: Great device but lacking output/apps for external devices (TV, Receiver)
Reviews.Author: someone
Reviews.Content: There are many reviews for this device, but not much information about how to output the device display content to external TV/monitor. So, I'll share my experience with that part in case it could be useful for someone else looking for that functioanlity.I had this for few weeks, and basically can echo many other reviewers. Excellent build quality, display, Amazon apps. If you're planning to use this device just to shop, read, watch videos on Amazon (on Kindle display) I doubt you could find anything else even close. However, if you want to output the display or sound content to an external device like a TV it all starts to go downhill. I want to highlight these issues since I could not find any details on the web (except very few).For some reason, Amazon does not provide apps such as "Pioneer Control App" and "Panasonic Remote 2". These are essential for me to control my TV and receiver from Kindle, so I could use them as a workaround for at least playing my own music/video library. To make matters worse, there's no other display output (like DLNA, through the home network). Kindle does not have an HDMI port, and the USB port does not work as a "Slim Port". So, I tried the "Kindle Certified" NetgearPush2TV. A real dissapointing experience. I wrote a separate review for that. Apparently Amazon tech support (and Netgear support) does not know much about this (I spoke with at least 4 agenrts, if I remember correctly). All Amazon agents were great, but couldn't help. So, if you plan to use the Kindle for the following then you'll be dissapointed:1. Play music from Kindle to your networked (aka connected) receiver2. Play videos (from internet/Amazon Instant Videos and from your own library) from Kindle to a networked TV3. GPS (e.g. with CoPilot) --- Kindle does not have a GPS, which I realized after buying. My bad, not whining hereA modern high-end device like Kindle should provide this sort of basic functionality, in my opinion. I was surprised to learn these limitations (the hard way). There are apps for this sort of thing (e.g. Flips/iMediaShare) but they're far from perfection with many limitations. I tried very hard to keep the Kindle and find workarounds for the limitations mentioned above but I could not. So I had to return it.Since then I bought a Nexus 7. Only problem I have is that Amazon does not allow it to access Instant videos (I knew this before I bought it but still weird, because I can use any other device and don't see how Amazon makes money by blocking it. Kindle is really cheap, so, also hard to understand how they make lot of money by selling the hardware. So, I'm confused but there must be some reason other than just Amazon/Google rivarly). I don't watch videos very often (but my son takes care of that for me with his Kindle) so it's not a huge isue for me at this point.Again, you need to read this review very carefully since I did not attempt to highlight lot of good aspects of the device since others have already mentioned those; if the extra networking/navigation/output functionality is not needed for you then the Kindle is an excellent device.

Reviews.Title: Lovely little tablet. Really enjoying it.
Reviews.Author: Christine Hill
Reviews.Content: This is the first tablet I've ever owned so I can't really compare it to anything else out there on the market but I am enjoying my Kindle a lot. There is no way I could afford a new iPad and after using this, I don't think I would want one anyway. I use this primarily for reading, watching videos and movies, and occasionally surfing the web, so nothing terribly extensive. It suits my needs just fine, at a lower price point and makes me feel like getting an iPad would just be overkill for me. I purchased mine with the adds included and honestly it's not a big deal. They're not intrusive with whatever I might be doing on the tablet and if it bothered me that much I would just pay the $15 to have them removed. There are some deals that are exclusive to kindle fire owners which is pretty awesome and since I use amazon quite often for purchases, I don't mind a chance at snagging a good deal. There are plenty of apps to pick from (for my purposes anyway) like Facebook, Youtube, and a few games here or there. It's lightweight and easy to hold for reading while lounging around in bed and the movies I've watch show up in beautiful quality. I would definitely recommend a kindle tablet to anyone who is looking for a tablet for entertainment purposes but is hesitant to shell out the cash for one of the more expensive brands. Overall I am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Pleased with purchase
Reviews.Author: Brad Batt
Reviews.Content: Awesome product, very pleased with my purchase. Just as good or even better than the Apple ipad. Very nice display

Reviews.Title: Love Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Audrey P. Hartman
Reviews.Content: I would highly recommend kindle fire devices especially HDX.  Easy to install and use and and any problems May day is there at your fingertips.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx7
Reviews.Author: EVELYN HUFF
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire Hdx7 is very lightweight and easy to use. This is my first Tablet and I found it very easy to use the apps and other functions.

Reviews.Title: Addicting
Reviews.Author: Louise
Reviews.Content: My Fire is addicting, oh no .......love it the May day is terrific, just purchased a cover for it. Amazon service is great and the Prime has paid for its self.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd kindle. I keep upgrading.  It does what a need and  more.  Only thing I'd change is the camera on the outside for pics not of myself

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Tina
Reviews.Content: I got the Kindle Fire HDX 7" as a gift and I've been using it for about 1.5 months now. I haven't owned a tablet before but I've played around on other's iPads. I feel like this tablet is very comparable to an iPad but at almost half the cost, I would pick the Kindle every time. I chose the 7" instead of the 8.9" because I like the smaller tablet and I personally would never hold up something so big to take a picture, especially when I have my phone or digital camera.Cons:- There is a blue/purple haze around the border of the screen that is visible on white. It actually doesn't bother me at all but it does bother some people. I don't even notice it's there unless I specifically pay attention to it. Even though it doesn't bother me, I would rather it not be there.- Battery life isn't great compared to the iPad. For the same amount of use, I'm used to charging every 2 weeks or so instead of every 3-4 days.- I don't like that the charger is plugged in at an angle instead of straight on. It's not really THAT big of an issue but it does take more effort than usual to plug it in.- This is more my fault for not reading/understanding the Prime benefits, but you only get the benefits of Prime if your account pays for it, not when you get added and another account pays for it (which completely makes sense). I was really looking forward to "borrowing" Kindle books for free and downloading movies to watch later offline but my husband wanted to keep paying for prime on his account and I didn't want to put my Kindle under his account or have both of us pay for Prime.Overall, I love my Kindle and it's a great tablet for the price. I haven't tried the Mayday feature yet but I'm glad it's there if I ever need to use it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect in every way.
Reviews.Author: afab4
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my wife to upgrade her original Kindle reader.I thought about getting her a Nexus 7, they are a nice product but I am glad I bought this instead.  She absolutely loves it.

Reviews.Title: Given as a Gift ...
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: My personal exp. w/ this device - It arrived in a  well designed package w/ all contents needed n w/ 73% power already - some apps r not compatible w/ the HDX that were fine on HD --Take precaution when searching 4 apps in Amazon store not all r compatible -- the device is thinner n a lot lighter - Once u familiarize yourself w/ the device ( easy 2 navigate ) - battery charge time only 4 hrs. -- the camera takes wonderful video / photos : additional options available 4 use w/ the camera -- one drawback > front camera only -if u desire front / back u would have 2 purchase 8.9 device -- pixels woo -- mayday feature haven't used it  yet -- has voice 2 text feature--

Reviews.Title: Great tool for everyone.
Reviews.Author: RSF
Reviews.Content: This device is well designed, color is excellent, good battery life, good sized screen, easy to use and generally all around handy device to have and the price is excellent for what you get.  I bought this for a friend and I haven't let them use it yet since I have been having such a good time with it.  This is the perfect device for the dedicated reader/traveler/movie buff especially with Amazon Prime.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: D. Hickie "pooldoc"
Reviews.Content: I have the first gen. Kindle Fire hd. The Hdx is definitely an upgrade. The picture is clearer and more defined. It is faster when opening videos and apps. I like the placement of the volume and power buttons better. I like the fact that the camera is already set up to use without having to install an app to access it. Its not the greatest camera but taking pics with a tablet isn't ideal anyway. The battery life seems to be a little better. Worthwhile purchase!

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: Shelley Courington
Reviews.Content: We ordered this for our daughter. Both my husband and I have only had ipads, so we were a little hesitant about the Kindle Fire. Well, there is no reason to be!  It is an excellent tablet for any age! We love the profile that we can set up, just for her. She has access to lots of books and games, as well as movies that are appropriate for her age. We don't have the ease of doing that with the iPad. She loves it and so do we!

Reviews.Title: Well worth it!
Reviews.Author: Marla Danis
Reviews.Content: Great tablet! Great value! We are an Apple family but for our 5 year old we read reviews and chose the HDX. It's perfect! Amazon coins have been a great value!

Reviews.Title: This review in not about the functionality of the kindle but the lack of information in the box
Reviews.Author: Dee "Damomo2"
Reviews.Content: I bought this, as a gift for my 72 year old mother. The first problem was that even though I marked it as a "gift" it was registered in my name. Her generation (mostly) is not tech savvy and we bought this model due to the mayday button. She lives 1000+ miles away so I could not help her with set up and it took her almost 3 weeks to get it set up, so she could use it. ( this was due to the fact that it was registered to me.) She was on the phone for several hours( at least 3+ hours and 3 separate calls ) with tech support before they figured this out. I understand that the registration process is intuitive for most generations BUT a simple fact sheet with a tech support phone number would have been very helpful. She had to hunt down the number, for herself. She was nervous when she didn't find anything other then the kindle, in the box. I concede that this might have prolonged the delay in getting it set up. I know she is going to LOVE this once she isn't afraid that it will be a hassle to use.

Reviews.Title: God help you if you have to call customer service...
Reviews.Author: Robert W. Segrest Jr. "Dog Lover"
Reviews.Content: So...I bought the Kindle Fire HDX 7" for my son for Christmas.  Things started off fine, but when the charge ran out, and we went to recharge the item, it would not come on again.Here comes the issue...I texted customer service (apparently not in this country) and while the person was exceedingly pleasant, it was clear from the beginning that the person did not fully grasp my questions.  Ultimately, I found out today that instead of shipping me a Kindle Fire HDX 7" (which I had told the individual was my item), I was shipped a Kindle Paperwhite.I just got off the phone with "Ted", who also was clearly not from this country, and although exceedingly pleasant proceeded to put me on hold for 15 minutes.  I confirmed that he was sending me another Kindle Fire HDX 7" before I got off the phone with him.We'll see.  I'm pretty aggravated any time I have to deal with Amazon Customer Service.  Might want to re-think this guys!

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Carolyn DeVries
Reviews.Content: My husband love this Kindle. Got it for him for Christmas. He never thought he'd like an e-reader, but now he's hooked with all that's available to him with WiFi.

Reviews.Title: PRICED JUST RIGHT
Reviews.Author: Taalib
Reviews.Content: This is a great product I'm totally satisfied with it I use it around the home, it's like having small mini laptop and it's great for watching movies and of course the Amazon system is top notch order on my products when using this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Kristal Allen
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my daughter who is in college and she loves it!!  She can take it to class instead of carrying her laptop and do everything she needs to on her Kindle.  This is her second Kindle product.  Glad I bought it for her!

Reviews.Title: WOW - I'm a Believer!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: We bought 2 kindles this holiday season and we love them.  They are small and fit comfortable in your hands, easy set up, easy screens to screens, everything is at your finger tips.  I love the parent controls and the mayday button is so useful.  My son loved the mayday button, he thinks we can just call them and talk!  LOL  We are trying out the amazon prime membership- so far so good, but of course the  movies we want you have to pay for it...  I high recommend this kindle for everyone.

Reviews.Title: Christmas surprise
Reviews.Author: Travis Leonard
Reviews.Content: My wife had been wanting one since they first came out. So if course that's the only thing she wanted for Christmas. Well we both decided that we weren't going to get each other gifts this year because money is extremely tight. But when it went on sale I just had to get it, and boy I'm glad I did. She absolutely loved it, and I was the best husband ever.

Reviews.Title: Cool Toy
Reviews.Author: Mathew Carruthers
Reviews.Content: Very versatile device for all my entertainment needs when I'm on the go, but I just wish the app store had a better selection of word processing apps.  Plenty of note-taking apps, but only minimal word processing stuff.  The perks of being an Amazon Prime member are worth it - so many freebies to take advantage of...

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Donald Mascot
Reviews.Content: It is everything that it's advertised as.  But I am still trying to figure out what I can use it for.  It's a nice eReader...probably the best.  And I can read and write email.  And I downloaded an app so I can view documents and spreadsheets.  And it shows my pics very nice.  But since I don't play any games, or watch movies on it, I am still wondering what the fuss is all about.  And I am sure I would be asking the same thing if I had an iPad.  But for the price, it's a very nice little device.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca A Hyde
Reviews.Content: I have a samsung tab 2 and loved it so for Christmas got the hubby a kindle hdx  and he really loves it. I have played with it a time or to and like it much better than my samsung tab it is faster , color is much brighter and not has heavy will have to get me one to.

Reviews.Title: Best Mini Tablet
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Bradley Smith "vVv ORION"
Reviews.Content: Super fast and BEAUTIFUL display and sound. Amazon HD content is gorgeous! BUT is missing 2 of my favorite apps Xbox Music and VUDU! Yes they are competitors but c'mon I have still subscribed to Prime. If Amazon offered to add my owned hard copy DVDs and BluRays to their Cloud then I wouldn't complain. Amazon please add this feature or give up the app battle.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindke HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: DN
Reviews.Content: My hubby got me the 7" hdx for Christmas gift and I love it! Resolution is soooo nice, I like the size it's not bulky, slim and light, perfect for travel, product works fast. I can play games and steam movies in Netflix. We so love the product that we got obe for our son. I definitely Recomend thu product!

Reviews.Title: Best gift to myself!!!
Reviews.Author: bunnywright
Reviews.Content: Anyone who has vision problems and has had to give up paper books this is it.  I purchased it for reading only but bought the HDX so my grandchildren can enjoy the games when they come to visit.  It gets plenty of use.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Nanaj7
Reviews.Content: not sure if it would be what I needed as being a newbe to electronics son has Netflix able to watch movies on his account books I would like to see rent for free for a month

Reviews.Title: Kindle # 4...
Reviews.Author: Gailbert1
Reviews.Content: ...and I love it! I started with a kindle (3rd gen), then kept upgrading like a tech junkie every time a new one came out...after reading reviews on the HDX online, st first I was a little worried about the "purple haze" issue everyone mentioned. But, after watching a YouTube video showcasing the actual performance of the tablet,I decided that little issue want enough to dissuade me, so  my husband went ahead and got it for me for Christmas. Once again, I think the performance of the kindle fire HDX outweighs that of the iPad on pretty much every front: display, processing speed, features ( I have no desire to use my tablet as a camera, so for those who would vote that as a deal breaker, it was moot for me). I love all the features, and even tho I have not yet used the Mayday feature, I think that is a great addition as well...no need to make an appointment to speak to a"genius"...mine lives in my device!! Once again, kindle delivered.  I am a kindle user for life!

Reviews.Title: Love the new HDX kindle!!!!
Reviews.Author: Doneit "Doneit"
Reviews.Content: Picture is exquisite and the sound is fantastic.Bought this one as a replacement for my previous 7" [my puppy got a hold of it].I loved the one I had, but this one definitely takes it up a notch.Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: My Second Kindle - Love It
Reviews.Author: Joyce
Reviews.Content: Bought my first Kindle Fire two years ago.  My husband suggested I get a new Fire HDX this year.  Can't tell you how much I love the new HDX, but still use my old one too, just can't seem to let it go. Love this product and I am sure there are more in my future.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Edward Rose
Reviews.Content: This was a great gift to give my wife she loves it. Maybe she  wont go blind looking at her cell phone.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire~!
Reviews.Author: Frances Zoller
Reviews.Content: Love how convenient it is to have so I can look things up so quickly!  I don't go anywhere without it!

Reviews.Title: Awesome...yet semi-invasive.
Reviews.Author: Ellery Higgins
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my wife for Christmas this year.  My one major complaint with the device itself is that (at the time I purchased it) there was a difference of $50 to not have the "Special Offers" lock screen.  It sounds cool on their site to have it anyway...but....they're just advertisements on the lock screen that take up the whole page.  Soo...instead of microtransactions inside of an app to get rid of ads, you have to pay $50 more to not have these on your lock screen.  Not cool Amazon...not cool.EDIT: I purchased this on a Black Friday sale, to clarify, it is no longer $50 difference in the devices for the ad/non-ad ones, but at the time, one was on a large sale and the other wasn't...making it a large price difference.Second complaint which is also the awesomeness of this product.  With the purchase of the Kindle Fire, Kindle Fire HD, and the Kindle Fire HDX, you get free 500 coins for the app store after registering it and adding billing information.  I completed this...and 0 coins.  Soo....being curious, I used the "Mayday" button on there to contact support.  Due to the friendliness of the agent that responded, I found out I was only like the 10th person to use it that morning, as it's still a new feature, and the agents are new to this too!  She was EXTREMELY helpful and kind and informed me it could take a couple hours to receive this promotional credit.Last but not least...the power cable.  It is at a FUNKY angle on the tablet in order to keep with the contoured angle of the tablet edge.  It angles upward while plugged in properly.  If not careful, I can see this charging port or cable becoming damaged easily.Beyond those few issues, this is an excellent tablet, it's perfectly sized, fits well in the hand, the screen is bright (I see none of the blue tint as others are describing), and the support is phenomenal!

Reviews.Title: A Christmas Gift She Loves
Reviews.Author: Happy Camper
Reviews.Content: My wife already had a Kindle.  I cannot remember whether I bought it at a Brick and Mortar place or through the Wonderful World of Amazon(tm).  It was an older, very lightweight model, in black and white and all shades in between.  She needs lightweight because of severe Rheumatoid Arthritis.  Anyway, it was time for an upgrade.  Since I have the Kindle Fire HD 7", HD Display, Wi-Fi and love it, the fact that the HDX was lighter and did more was a selling point.Although she's not used it much at this point, everything is what she wants.  It does weigh a bit more than her original Kindle, but it's a con she's willing to live with.

Reviews.Title: A great tablet
Reviews.Author: Shaun Kanak
Reviews.Content: I finally bought my first tablet.  Since we are long-time Amazon Prime customers, I wanted a tablet that would play Amazon Prime video as well as Hulu+ and Netflix.  And, of course, a good Kindle experience.  That narrowed the field to either iPad or Kindle Fire.  After the Fire HDX came out it was clear that Amazon had some serious hardware.  The latest Kindle OS helped sell me too.I do miss the Google apps that I have on my droid phone but fortunately some of them can be side-loaded if you find the apk file on the web.Reading books and graphic novels is a great experience.Watching videos (both streaming and saved to the kindle) is great.Sound quality is very good.I'm still getting to know the Free Time feature for my young kids but it looks promising.Bottom line...if you like to read (on a tablet) and watch video then you will have a hard time beating the Fire HDX and when you consider the price, there's no contest.  I'm so happy with my 7" Fire HDX that I bought the 8.9" Fire HDX for my wife and kids.

Reviews.Title: Wish I knew more about Freetime before I bought
Reviews.Author: Mark Freeman
Reviews.Content: 1)  We bought this tablet after hearing great things about Freetime and the ability it gives you to limit exposure to your kids for content you don't want them to have access to.  However, we didn't know we couldn't let our kids access music while locked in freetime.  It has been a very trying couple of days while I have tried to find a work around.  From other reviews, I see that there were workarounds before, but Amazon has closed those off with it latest software release.  One of my daughters is very disappointed and I don't blame her.2)  The mayday button has come in handy for me already in the first couple of days of use.  They have been very quick to respond and other than not being able to help solve my music issue, they have been knowledgeable, polite, and very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Meets My Needs
Reviews.Author: W. Bradley
Reviews.Content: I bought this unit basically for three reasons: 1) a convenient portal for browsing in Amazon.com - I hate going to stores anymore and I find Amazon to be a convenient one-stop shop for most things I need and the Kindle does that very well which is what Amazon had in mind, 2) a convenient and quick way to browse various internet sites that I check regularly w/o having to fire up my laptop; 3) as an eBook/video/music platform that's extremely portable. I bought the Kindle because of all the above and the features were great too. The display was very good, the price was right and the on-demand help feature was nice too. For those buyers who have in mind of downloading a lot of games, etc. from the internet might want to look at another platform but if your needs mirror mine then the Kindle is hard to beat.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Nathan Yardley
Reviews.Content: Awesome device just a little lacking in good apps from amazon. Sound and picture are quality though. A few more decent apps and it would be much better.

Reviews.Title: Buy this!
Reviews.Author: Theresa L. Lane "EnglishUnicorn"
Reviews.Content: We have a Google Chromecast and Iphones here. This works with our existing technology ecosystem. It recognized the Google Chromecast instantly. No issues with compatibility. Lots of aps. Excellent speed, streaming, OS runs faster than any Android or IOS I have seen. Very easy to use and great MAYDAY support on Christmas day. I did not and will not regret this purchase. We Chromecast Netflix off this as well as Pandora and several other apps. Sound on this thing is EPICLY AWESOME and LOUD. Amazon has officially won the tablet war. Ipad..it is time to lower your price to TRY to be competitive.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use, great with Amazon Prime
Reviews.Author: Eric Houser
Reviews.Content: Great to use with Amazon Prime.  Large amount of movies and TV shows to choose from for free.  Lending library is also cheap and convenient..

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: geoerl niles
Reviews.Content: Very clear, good connectivity. My wife really likes it! The apps are easy to find! And the movies are crystal clear

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle yet
Reviews.Author: Diane D
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th Kindle. I started with the 2nd generation. It was ok, but hard to read outside. Then I bought the Kindle Fire. Much better. But it broke after a couple of years. I bought my husband a Paper white, which he loves. BUT this HDX is great !  The picture quality is excellent. My grandson loves the Free Time so he can play his games and read books. I used the Mayday feature and was very impressed with the service. I like it because it is lighter than the original Kindle Fire too. Easy to navigate and search for things. I would highly recommend this to anyone. I LOVE IT !!!!!!

Reviews.Title: love it..
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "ReadFreak"
Reviews.Content: Yes I got it today, so no real issues. It's my third kindle my fire HD is being passed on to another family member. It's still going strong. The light bleed which I was worried about due to other reviews is insignificant to me and usually LED lights bother me. So I'm glad this worked out. Unless I look for it I don't notice it. The browser is much faster and I'm happy with the set up of buttons and such. The mayday button is nice too for when you really can't figure something out. Overall I'm looking forward to this becoming my new favorite device. I didn't give 5 stars as I've only had it for about 4 hours ;)

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Kyle Beck
Reviews.Content: Okay so this device is outstanding.  I am coming from the original kindle fire and it was well worth the upgrade.  The screen is amazing, very sharp, definitely as good if not better than the retina dispalay.  The sound is also very good.  The new interface is great.  It is really fast and fluid.  My only complaints are the location of the volume and power buttons, as well as the camera.  They are positioned in A way vest suited for holding the device landscape, while I would personally prefer them to be positioned in more of a portrait manner.  Another plus to the device is the Appstore has grown a lot since the first kindle fire.  It has most of the games that iOS has.  The only thing it lacks is a a program like word, excell, and PowerPoint.  Over all I would definitely recommend this device to anyone who likes an amazing display, a very decent battery life, great sound, a good Appstore, and a light sleek device.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: My laptop died, with no hope of repair, the day after I ordered this Kindle.  So far, I'm not missing it.  I do find a stylus makes me more comfortable than poking about the screen with my clumsy fingers.  I also have a Kindle keyboard, which remains my favorite for lounging and reading.  Comparing the Fire HDX and the Kindle keyboard is a bit like the old apples and oranges comparison, though.  It's really, in my mind, comparing an ereader to a tablet.This Kindle is great fun, particularly if you enjoy streaming media and wandering around online.  It's an amazing amount of technology in a tiny package.

Reviews.Title: Another Win!
Reviews.Author: Buddy
Reviews.Content: Once again Amazon does a great job with the kindle. I bought this for my wife and in turn took her kindle fire the original. The graphics are amazing and it is really fast for the kids when playing games.  As always love Amazon and their products.

Reviews.Title: I love the new kindle fire hdx!
Reviews.Author: Arielle Taylor
Reviews.Content: Works beautifully. Feather light when compared with last year's model. I got the Mobile network with AT&T; which works fine.

Reviews.Title: Kindle's on Fire
Reviews.Author: Spencer Seiler
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire HDX! My previous Kindle Fire HD got shattered due to my own use, but the Kindle Fire HDX has many more features and looks fabulous. It's also notably lighter than the other 'Kindle Fire's. I'm very happy with this

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: jeg1946
Reviews.Content: I started using this when traveling a few days after receiving it.  I was traveling by train and their WiFi doesn't allow Netflix so I downloaded several episodes of a show I was watching.  I am very happy with it.  The pictures are clear, the sound is good and the set up and use is easy.  My husband and I are now sharing it as he is downloading books to read.

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet!
Reviews.Author: C
Reviews.Content: First off, I got started off as soon as I unpacked and turned it on. As soon as I logged in with my account all my kindle content synced up! I got the free trial so I had picked the kindle with the ads and I did not feel like the ads were bothersome at all. They mostly showed up when the tablet was in a 'sleep' status so I saw them when I was turning it back on. I even clicked on some out of curiosity since they are items I would be interested in. I did not add any extra apps so I just used what was already installed. It was a bit of a learning curve since I have been using an iPad but I was able to figure it out without much trouble. The browser is user friendly and the menus are not hard to use (once you figure out where the controls are). I mostly used it to watch movies and shows from amazon since I have Prime. I loved being able to take it around the house and not have a sore wrist! It is very light and the screen felt pretty hardy so i didn't worry about scratching the screen or the possibility of it dropping. The screen was crystal clear so I thoroughly enjoyed watching movies and shows on it ( the imdb inserts during shows and movies were a plus for me). I thought its size would be a disadvantage but it felt just like a regular size tablet. I liked that I could easily carry it in my handbag without feeling the extra weight or bulk! Battery life was decent. I was able to use it continuosly for at least 3 hours before it got critically low, although I noticed that even plugged to the wall it would somehow still be on and wouldn't be 100% charged? (could have been tks I wasn't physically turning it off during charge time) I assumed that maybe it was because ads popped up during this time. I had a hard time returning it but I wasn't quite ready to part with that amount of money right then. I still want to get one for sure!!!! So basically to sum it up, this tablet is a small, delightfully light, hardy, crystal clear, fast (in my opinion), and handy tablet. If you use Amazon a lot, it is a great tablet to have! I buy and rent e-books from Amazon, and have purchased most of my music from here too so, it was great to access all my content from it! I didn't think I would want one but after test driving it for a month now I really really do want to get one! I think it's a great little tablet!

Reviews.Title: SO FAR SO GOOD
Reviews.Author: Jordan "Jordan"
Reviews.Content: I received my new Kindle Fire HDX a couple of days ago. So far I've been very pleased with the device. The screen quality is great. The download time I found especially quick. The HDX is considerably lighter then the previous version.I recommend this tablet very much.

Reviews.Title: Enjoyed it!
Reviews.Author: Carlos Watson
Reviews.Content: Perfect fit for everyday use access to amazon prime a plus. Truly a consumer type device. This is not meant for business use.

Reviews.Title: Love the Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Nei'Shay
Reviews.Content: After careful consideration of the Samsung Galaxy, IPad (I have an iPhone), and the Kindle, I chose the Kindle. And I am very satisfied. I watch movies on it and it has a very clear picture. The sound is also great. No regrets at all here.

Reviews.Title: mostly fantastic
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Crowder
Reviews.Content: It's fast, works from all angles, offers a seamless interface for my e-books, Amazon music, Audible books, and apps.The Silk browser is fast and user-friendly. Light weight makes this easy to transport in my handbag. Excellent sound quality and video. Song lyrics automatically pop up on many of my music tracks. The battery life is pretty good, and the battery recharges rapidly.  I do with it had the option of using Chrome because of the transferable nature of my bookmarks from my laptop and phone. I have not yet discovered the task manager or a way to change the wallpaper and screen saver. Most apps that I used on my Galaxy tablet, which this replaced, are available. So far only Weather Bug and Pet Rescue Saga are the only ones I really miss. I wish I had chosen the option of adding a Verizon line rather than having to rely on my mobile hot spot for WiFi. I also miss having the ability to turn off the screen auto-rotate feature. The charging cable is a mini-USB which is convenient, since it's interchangeable with my phone. It's also angled to minimize the problem of it getting twisted and weakened when I'm changing it while I use it. The book X-Ray feature enhances the reading experience, such as keeping track of characters. If I change the default language to that of whichever book I'm reading, the dictionary feature changes automatically to reflect it, as do the text settings, even down to currency notation. On the whole, I'm quite satisfied.

Reviews.Title: May not be for large families
Reviews.Author: Scooter
Reviews.Content: This review is solely aimed to highlight a limitation of the Kindle Fire HDX.  After much research I purchased the Kindle fire HDX mainly because it advertised the ability to easily control access to content for children.  In fact, on the Kindle Fire HDX website under the "Kindle for Kids" section it states " Parents can create a profile for each of their children and choose what books, apps, games, and videos they want to give their kids access to."  This sounded great and exactly what I wanted for a media device for the kids.  However, upon setting the new Kindle up I found that the maximum number of accounts possible is 4.  We have five children and thus this obviously does not allow us to establish an account for every child.  If you have a large family you need to be aware of this limitation before you purchase the kindle.

Reviews.Title: An accurate review of the kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Miranda
Reviews.Content: I just received the new kindle this evening and boy am I impressed. I own a kindle keyboard so this is a huge upgrade for me. I am a huge fan of amazon and I did plenty of research on this product before even though I knew I would love it. I am a huge fan of the kindle. For those of you that post bad ratings due to lack of apps or other stupid things is your own fault for not researching this product first. This product is a KINDLE. This is not an ipad or other kind of tablet. For a kindle this is a very good tablet. The kindle was originally made to read books and even though now it is more centered around internet usage, it is still for reading. No you will not find the same features and capabilities on this kindle as you will on another higher level tablet. For the price paid for this kindle it is truly worth it. The color is beautiful and the processor is very responsive and clear. It really is a great upgrade for the kindle. It may not be up to the same level as an ipad but for the price and the fact that it's a kindle makes it amazing. This product is for amazon lovers and those who are dedicated to amazon. I have a prime membership and I have already tested out some of the videos which are great. I also love the sound and how the volume buttons are on the back. I understand that some of you actually have received a defective tablet and that would be a good reason to give it a low rating but it is a new piece of technology so there are going to be some defective ones. As far as the blue or purple hue when reading that everyone pointed out goes, I don't know if it is different on different kindles but mine is very faint and I can hardly notice it. It is definitely not a big deal. There are too many people comparing the kindle to an ipad. No it will not have all the same apps because kindle has its own browser called silk. There however is still a lot of apps available and I assume the popular ones wouldn't be hard to find. There is also a way to sideload apps and all it takes is some research on youtube to figure out how. I am very impressed with this kindle and I understand its greatness. For those of you that hated it because you did not do your research, you should be looking in to this stuff before you buy it. Again, the kindle is for amazon lovers and those who mainly enjoy reading and surfing the web. For those of you that simply play games and want a ton of apps, a different tablet would probably be better for you. I can't wait to learn more about my kindle and experience the other great things that are yet to come. Thank you amazon for your great products as always.

Reviews.Title: Xmas present for daughter
Reviews.Author: volebal1
Reviews.Content: Daughter was trying to read books on her phone which was way to small to read.  Bought her this kindle charged it and downloaded all her books for her and added some games and useful apps.  So now it is wrapped and ready to use for Christmas day. Now she can surf the net, play games and relax and read without struggling with the small print.  Will also come in handy entertaining the toddler grandchild with the game and book apps I added just for him. I have had no problems adding and setting it up for her.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!!
Reviews.Author: Kyle Smith
Reviews.Content: Hardware and form factor are great!Great power to play high quality games and listen to music with no lag.Rhe performance overall is really good and better than what i expected from a kindle. Never had a kindle but sadly couldn't keep it since it was on a 30 day trial.I would recommend this tablet to anyone that loves tablets! :)

Reviews.Title: GREAT GIFT
Reviews.Author: Micheal Andrisano
Reviews.Content: A present our grandson wanted, We had purchased one for his brother, who absolutely loves it so this was a no brainer when he asked for one this year, great gift.

Reviews.Title: HDX happy
Reviews.Author: Kathy L Cruz
Reviews.Content: So so happy with my kindle HDX! This is my 4th kindle and the best so far. I didn't get the kindle fire when it first came out be cause I couldn't see it when I read outside in Sun, I just adjust the background lighting on my HDX and it's fine! I also must be lucky because I don't have that blue.screen or outline most comment on.  Just so happy!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: linda p.
Reviews.Content: I chose this because my younger niece told me to get it and the price was right. I wanted it for when I was away from home. It is small enough to put in my purse and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle Tablet They've ever Made!
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with the lightness of the tablet. Something that has been bugging ever since the first one was made. That's no longer a problem.  The display is top-notch!  You don't usually say that about a Kindle tablet...you can now.  The mayday feature is just bananas! So cool! The only thing that's really hindering this tablet (besides the lack of apps but that will come) is the email function. If they can't get some type of integration with Gmail then they need to just set up their own email service.  Cuz right now, it still looks bad in comparison to having the gmail functionality.  That's why they get 4 stars instead of 5.

Reviews.Title: Excellent small tablet
Reviews.Author: janice399 "JM"
Reviews.Content: It's small & light which works good for my walks. Everything about it is fast, the sound is good, and the display is vivid.I did have trouble downloading but was solved by properly registering the device.  Now there is no problem with it in anyway.

Reviews.Title: Good audio, nice size, good display, MiraCast issues?
Reviews.Author: traveler "traveler"
Reviews.Content: Good audio and display. I can listen to music while reading my docs and books. I mostly load my own music rather than using Amazon since I like pristine raw audio rather than mp3s. Sometimes I view video so I chose this instead of a paper white.Not enough applications on Amazon store however there is at least one good audio and office application. There are some reasonably good chess applications.The Kindle HDX does not have a hardware HDMI connector or a SlimPort so I can connect a large screen for presentations or watching video. After looking into MiraCast and ChromeCast I downgraded my opinion to 'IT's OK'.

Reviews.Title: I love my kindle !
Reviews.Author: jr Eller
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle ! wish it had a USB slot for printing etc., otherwise it's great! the screen resolution is great!

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: terri l. selvey
Reviews.Content: This little baby fits in my purse and does everything my laptop does and even more quickly.  I can evendo dictation on this for my job.  It's more lightweight than the Kindle Fire, which I also love.  I have 4 Kindlesand this one is rarely out of my reach.  I had to really look for the purple edges people were talking about,and with very close scrutiny I saw them, but then immediately forgot they were there.  Not an issue at all.For the price difference my only regret is that I got the 32 instead of the 64.  Maybe next year.  The camera,as some have said, is virtually useless unless you want to take pictures of yourself.  I don't want the bigger tablet because I like to be able to slip it into a regular-sized purse.  I hope someday they come out with a rear facing camera on the 7". I guess that would be my only disappointment, but from the reviews I knew that when I bought it so I still give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" Review
Reviews.Author: Becki Rasmussen
Reviews.Content: I am liking my new Kindle so far very well, I had another Kindle that was 15 months old that would no longer charge or hold a charge. I have spoken with others that have had the same problem. I am just hoping the new Kindle lasts longer than the first one. I have purchased 2 other Kindles that are about 1 year old for my two grandsons and i hope  their Kindles last.

Reviews.Title: REALLY COOL!!
Reviews.Author: Les Mack
Reviews.Content: I LOVE it! I have a Paperwhite with 3g WI-FI and thisexceeds it by FAR. The 4 G Wi-Fi works reallywell, the images POP out at you from the HDX display it's almost like 3-d. The battery recovery timeis very quick.

Reviews.Title: Talk to the kindle, it listens.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I just updated from the original 7 to the new HDX version, and am glad I did. Overall it works better, faster, and so far no problems.It seems to have a bit longer battery life, but that could still be improved. Beautiful new screen image. One new feature though really impressed me. I found it by accident. Speech to Text is activated by a microphone button on the keyboard. It works amazingly well for me,  It was worth the upgrade all by itself. I spent in excess of $100.00 for a program for my PC, and have been disappointed with it. It is difficult to use, requiring many key strokes to get it going, not to mention the necessary use of a headset. The Kindle is very accurate in getting down what I say, not 100% yet, but closer than I can do with my fingers on the PC. Now, all I have to do is learn to speak in commas and periods. That unfortunately it can not do by itself. Just push the microphone button, keep your hand away from the microphone area, and talk.

Reviews.Title: Loving  it
Reviews.Author: Claudine Jancik
Reviews.Content: I  like  everything  about  the  Kindle Fire HDX. It  has  great  color ,  is easy  to  use and  I  can  read  anywhere  day  or  night,  which  was  my  primary  purpose in  buying it.

Reviews.Title: Better then my ipad2 but!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: kiracatto
Reviews.Content: I really like my kindle fire hdx more then the ipad2 for the size and weight and reading books, the blue outline doesn't bother me or interfere with my reading ,What I don't like is just like ipad you can't use outside apps without indangering your system, I wanted something that would let me use diffrent apps, I'm hoping that Amazon will add more apps I want, but all in all I love my kindle fire hdx and you can really see the diffrence when watching movies the graphics are wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with it
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I was looking for display is beautiful and book selection, app selection and movies are great, thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Great Display.  Books looked great,  and is lightweight.  Price is wonderful, battery last a long time. Thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Audrey Green
Reviews.Content: What can  I say about this Kindle Fire HDX is just what I have been looking for.  Love it and the special offers don't bother me at all.

Reviews.Title: awesome little tablet
Reviews.Author: jonathan Fisk
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet that does it all and for a phenominal price. Its not too big and cumbersome. Easy to carry and android apps galore. Anyone who is considering purchasing a tablet should seriously consider the kindle fire series.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx is an awesome product.
Reviews.Author: Andrew Kramer
Reviews.Content: This tablet is perfect. It fast, crystal clear hd screen, and does everything I would want out of a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Definitely top tablet
Reviews.Author: israel perez
Reviews.Content: Great Product. Wish I could've kept it but will consider buying one in the near future. Keep up the good work

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Chres parker
Reviews.Content: Haven't had enough time with it yet but I' m pretty haapy with my HDX so far. I've noticed a few quirks, but it may be just me. Wish it came with iespell checker.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Bobio
Reviews.Content: I bought this because my Kindle Fire HD was refusing to function when there was still about 38% battery life left. The HDX is slimmer, lighter, and the operating system is more user-friendly. There are more pixels so the display is a lot clearer. I was surprised to find the sound quality of the HD is better than the HDX. But the battery life of the HDX is much better. Overall, I'm glad I bought the HDX.

Reviews.Title: Just the fastest period!!
Reviews.Author: obiken "obiken"
Reviews.Content: First of all if you are deciding what is the best tablet good luck, it depends on what you want it for. I owned the Apple mini with Retina, and I will again. However, if you are looking for the fastest WiFi, the best sound BY FAR, the best books, and movies, the Kindle Fire HDX is your huckleberry.You cannot beat the Apple for ease of use, or the apps. IF Kindle had access to all the Apple 3rd party apps, due to the price difference, it would be game over.However for Netflix, and internet browsing its not even close. KFHDX is way faster. So yes, sometimes the experts are right!!

Reviews.Title: Genius Amazon
Reviews.Author: FreedomAndLiberty
Reviews.Content: This product is just awesome. If you want the simple Amazon Prime tool to shop,watch,listen...or need help.. just click mayday....This product actually builds my desire to purchase more from Amazon. Also if i want to install google apps it is possible. Seriously Amazon Prime is just the way to go for all your shopping needs. So ..it has a fast enough processor to game and complete tasks like surf or watch a movie. Oh yeah another big thing was....reading books...this thing makes it easy to read a book....Amazon Prime and this device just works and is a huge solution for many tasks just reach down and pick it up...only thing that I would like to see is Kindles offer more harddrive space....like a 1tb...yeah we are in a time of file servers aka cloud servers...but in times of no internet...a real harddrive is a must...face it 4G/3G is a hoax, its a joke when it comes to internet so don't fall for the 4G lie and highway robbery mobile internet companies charge for internet...Amazon seriously this product and your growing services is on the right track for the future. Just remember don't close off this device to just Amazon...that would be the end of Kindle. I wish I had the money to have several of these devices....sometimes i don't need the full pc desktop but have a certain need and this device makes it possible and does so smoothly very good device very good tool. Keep up the good work Amazon! Amazon has so much potential that could grow alot of business and create alot of jobs....Kindle HDX is worth having! And my boy loves it! I recommend this especially if you are a Amazon user. I used this product for 20+ days or so and I'm getting one for Christmas. Battery life could be better but so could the ram and harddrive...but for what I did the device was not a problem it actually was the solution for many many tasks.  I watched movies, streamed music, watched video, surfed, read articles and books, used the alarm and calender, used yahoo weather app, played games. The only thing i noticed as something it lacked was harddrive space when the Amazon prime video offered to download the movie better quality would require more harddrive space. But this is more of need when traveling through an area where there would be no internet or limited internet. And... Really... the only thing...lacking is my bank roll to buy constantly 24/7 on Amazon with this device..haha...I'm sure i could come up with negatives but this device really is a solution a tool that just works for me.

Reviews.Title: Finally, Amazon got this mostly right!
Reviews.Author: A. Wertheim "werthla"
Reviews.Content: I have the Kindle HD, iPad, and Surface 2 just for background.I have a lot of problems with HD in terms of its claim to being a tablet - the internet is very fussy, it's slow and is simply not reliable as a tablet.  But it's a great E reader.I wanted a good 7 inch tablet.  I bought a returned the Google Nexus 7.  It was great except for no browser having a reading pane which is important in a small tablet.  You would think Google would have this in Chrome but no.  The screen is the best in class.I went to Best Buy and they had the HD and HDX side by side.  I compared the internet and there was no comparison - they HDX was very fast so I bought it to try out.  Happy to report that this is now a true tablet in that the Silk browser is much improved,, the quad core makes all the difference, the internet is now very usable and fast.HDX also has improvements over the HD - you can slide up from the bottom to access recently used programs which is very important if you need to switch between apps since only Surface allows you to keep two apps open simultaneously in the tablet world.  This works better than iPad.A page from other androids - you swipe down to see email and other notifications.The power button is now accessible!Size is smaller and slimmer.Some have noticed that there is a purple haze to the background.  That's true and that's something you have to judge for yourself if it bothers you.There is a limit on the number of tabs you can open on the Silk browser.Battery life is improved over HD.  It now comes with a cable and wall charger.There is no rear camera.  If that's important to you, consider the iPad Mini.  OR you can buy a real camera for the price difference.In summary, there is really no reason to buy the HD unless the price is $100.  The HDX is now a good competitive tablet.  The app store remains a problem if you depend on apps for games.  I have found some surprisingly good specialty apps.This is smaller than the iPad Mini and almost half the price.  Unless you are trapped in the Apple ecosystem and need their apps, (there isn't much you can't get from the web sites) this is a good alternative.

Reviews.Title: ABSOLUTELY fantastic
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I wish I had WiFi in my home, so I can enjoy it even more. Love May Day button- the people have really helped me a number of times. Don't understand why my book pages don't turn like the advertisement- someone needs to tell us why. Easy to download- great color and sound too. This is my 4th Kindle-- got to control myself on upgrades BUT the people I have given them to have enjoyed my spending!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Karen M. Hooker "luv2read"
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle fire HDX, it's the perfect adult companion, I take it with me everywhere. It's fully equipped with games, books, movies and much more.It's easy to use and I have to hide it from my husband and two year old daughter who seem to use it more than me. It has a wide variety of free applications and the quality of the Hd screen is perfect for reading a nd viewing movies. It's never a dull moment with the Kindle Fire HDX,  I plan on purchasing two more so I can enjoy it without interruption. Lastly, the price is reasonable, can't be beat!!!

Reviews.Title: It's perfect for mom
Reviews.Author: Greg Shires
Reviews.Content: My mom loves her "basic" kindle.  I wanted to get her one that lights up and has access to internet, facebook, email, etc.  She loves it, so far she still just reads on it but I'm hoping she'll eventually use it for more.

Reviews.Title: The greatest 7" tablet for me!!
Reviews.Author: Morgan Ryker
Reviews.Content: When glancing around for tablets @ Peter Jones' dpt store (John Lewis) in London, the most appealing tablet I noticed was the Kindle Fire HDX 7. Since this tablet cannot yet be purchased in The Netherlands in a store, this was the only chance for me to pick it up and feel and explore it. I loved the design, the feel, the incredible clarity and mega-fast processor.Back home, I tested a lot of tablets at a Dutch local megastore. Google Nexus seemed appealing, then Samsung tab 3.0, but I disliked the shapes, too long/narrow screen proportions. LG Gpad 8.3 was another temptation, but again: that weird long narrow screen? I jumped on to Apple's Ipad Mini 2. Bigger screen than the average 7" and just perfectly proportioned. Simply not being an Apple's type of guy, I hesitated. What held me back at Ipad Mini 2, were the limitations of dropping audio and video files on it. You would have to use Itunes for almost everything and convert many movie files.With Kindle, I wasn't sure about its Amazon-tunnel-vision strategy. But I also read there were a lot of ways to sideload apps outside the Amazon app-convent.From the day I received it (3 days after purchase, this gets UPS delivered to your doorstep and yes, they do ask your neighbours to receive it on your behalf in case you're not at home), I have not regretted this purchase for one second.I like Amazon products a lot. I do read Kindle books. But I like Kobo also. No problem, on youtube there's a perfectly clear instruction video on how to bring Kobo to your Kindle, and the two do peacefully co-exist.Magazines: lovely, cheap and easy to order, a delight to page through on this tablet.PDF files, Word documents: perfect viewing.For more extensive typing, I purchased the Perixx Periboard-805L, which works like a charm as a bluetooth wireless foldable keyboard for my Kindle tablet.Kindle Fire HDX 7 had my first attention, and remained my ultimate choice. Best case to keep it protected in my opinion: Poetic Slimline. Thank you, Amazon! A very happy customer.

Reviews.Title: Very Good but not intuitive
Reviews.Author: RetiredDIY
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I wanted an e-reader that I could do more with then just read books.  So far I like it very much but find that it does not give great directions for how to use some of its features. I am still trying to discover HOW to sync documents, if I finally get it done I would give this item 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: Susan J. Smith
Reviews.Content: My old Kindle is dying so ordered this one.  It is just incredible so far.  Very easy to set up and use.  The graphics are beautiful and the sound amazing!  I'm not too fond of the cover I ordered because it doesn't hold the stylus - bet that stylus will be lost in a day..lol

Reviews.Title: Mobile movie theatre .
Reviews.Author: alirich
Reviews.Content: The screen is sharper than my hdmi tv .The speaker sound is incredible for its size.I can watch movies and read anywhere and not bother anyone (when using head phones.)The 7 inch fire HDX is so light I can hold it like a book .Excellent wifi reception.Easy to use.I do admit that I watch most on netflix because cheaper and better selection.

Reviews.Title: Crashed constantly. I have lost all hope in Amazon hardware.
Reviews.Author: Sebastian "speelbergo"
Reviews.Content: I still have a Kindle Fire 1st Gen and have used it heavily for two years. I gave it one star because of the charging problems that Amazon wouldn't fix. Besides that and the occasional crash, I have gotten along with my old kindle pretty well since 2011.With the huge number of improvements that come with the Introduction of the HDX I decided to give Amazon tablets another chance.I returned it after one week's use.There were many very nice improvements to both hardware and software, but i'm not going to detail them because the fatal flaws completely overshadowed anything good I can possibly say about it.My Kindle HDX froze 3 times in two days. And when I say froze, i mean it became completely non-responsive for over an hour until i finally gave up and performed a hard reboot. All 3 times I was using the music player, which should be the easiest, most straightforward operation! I hate to part ways with Amazon because their hardware is so inexpensive but I guess you get what you pay for. I got my wife a two year-old USED iPad, and it has worked flawlessly for a year in our possession, never freezing or requiring a hard reboot.

Reviews.Title: Its a gig monster.
Reviews.Author: Chantell Harris
Reviews.Content: Seems to absorb a large amount of data due to programs running in the background. I had to delete my jetpack info from the system since it ate up 12gigs of data while in sleep mode.

Reviews.Title: Handy size, and smooth operation.
Reviews.Author: James Greenamyer "dayglowjim"
Reviews.Content: This device was something I thought I didn't need, as I have an HP Touchpad, and it works fine for most things, but Amazon had the try it for 30 days for free, so I did.  I decided to keep it after about three days of using it.  The email loads faster, the picture on the screen is so sharp it's amazing, graphic novels are crystal clear, the OS is really easy to use...It is just a great little device that fits in my briefcase, and goes everywhere with me now.

Reviews.Title: Former iPad 1 owner
Reviews.Author: Marcus Cane Prevost
Reviews.Content: This has been a great tablet. I'm coming from an Apple ecosystem. I have Apple everything. This is my first non Apple purchase. I really love the iPad but the market has changes since I bought the original version. There are way more options. The Kindle was a fraction of the cost of the ne iPad mini retina. The screen is gorgeous. I find it the perfect size for watching movies in the hand. Amazon makes it very easy to move your music over to the Amazon ecosystem from Apple if you want to do that. For 20ish bucks a year you can move all your apple music to the cloud at Amazon. From there you can download whatever songs you want to your Kindle or just play them from the cloud. Very easy.I was initially worried about not having access to the full Android spectrum of apps. It hasn't proven to be an issue at all. It took me about 10 minutes to sidestep the Amazon store and install Chrome and Firefox. I was also able to install a flash player and can now run any flash web apps through the Dolphin web browser. I couldn't do this on my iPad.The touchscreen is very snappy with no lag at all. This processor is speedy.A big upgrade from my iPad 1. The built in speakers are also better than my iPad 1. I didn't know if I would be OK with the smaller screen bit I'm enjoying it quite a bit. The more convenient size has be taking the kindle with me more than I ever did with the iPad. The iPad was really just too big to lug around. The kindle slips into my coat pocket easy.The special offers on the home screen don't bother me at all. Once you swipe to unlock the Kindle they go away and don't bother you at all.Mayday is awesome! I had a question just today that I couldn't find the answer to so I tried it. Within 15 seconds I had a technician on my screen helping me out. She was courteous and helpful and solved my problem quickly. Really glad I made the switch. This tablet is a killer value.

Reviews.Title: Does not hold it's charge
Reviews.Author: Rain
Reviews.Content: Great features but if you are not near an outlet you are out of luck. This was a gift not sure I would purchase.

Reviews.Title: Bought this as a gift for my mom; she loves it!
Reviews.Author: Meredith Piccirillo
Reviews.Content: First things first; the screen! OH my the screen is gorgeous. This gift was to my mom for the holidays and she couldn't have been happier. It replaced her existing first gen kindle and that upgrade is akin to going from a schwinn to a ferrari. Fast, easy to use, intuitive and did I mention that screen? Wow.The unit is super light and the 7" form factor is perfect for her. She can read books in bed or use the apps as a kitchen assistant. Accessories are a bit pricey, but that's become the de facto standard for any iDevice or other. First world problems, I know.We/She hasn't had to use the mayday button, but just knowing that it's there is piece of mind for my husband who usually plays the role of tech support for our family's cache of gadgets. Cheaper than an ipad mini with a better screen, this device is a no brainer. The only other mini-tab we were considering was the Nexus 7, but it was a gift for the not exactly tech savy 65 year old mother, so we wanted the familiarity and sandboxing of the Kindle HDX.Would we have liked it to have native access to the Google Play store? Sure, but most apps that mom would use are represented in the kindle store, so it's not a huge negative.Pros: Cost, incredible screen, ease of entry, light weightcons: no native google play store, expensive accessoriesverdict? Buy. Easily one of the best tech purchases we have made. Spring for the non-ad version while you're at it. It makes for such a nicer user experience.

Reviews.Title: Well, okay, 3.75 stars
Reviews.Author: Owen Murray
Reviews.Content: I'll preface this right now though: this could easily be a 4.75 - 5 star review. But before I get to what drags the score down for me, the good stuff about the Kindle Fire HDX:- Clearly more than a reader.  The hardware in this is powerful and easily high up comparative to other tablet-like device of this size.- Battery life is great so far.- Fantastic screen quality; reading, browsing the internet, using apps like netflix, tumblr, etc., all look fantastic- Sound is also very good, headphones and speakers both- Ads are very unobtrusive (if applicable to your kindle), only appearing on the unlock screen.- Like advertised, works straight out of the box (obviously if you have linked a previously existing amazon account to the kindle)- Big name apps from the amazon store work perfectly. Netflix, Tumblr, Pintrest, Pandora, Skype, Steam, Sonos, BBC, NPR, Twitch are some that I had no trouble quickly installing and using. The email integration is great, and the goodreads integration is absolutely fantastic.- Most of the settings and features are very intuitive, and when using for the first time there will typically be very basic, quick tutorials.- A great deal for the price.- If you own Amazon content in their cloud its a matter of seconds to access it. And if you have Prime, the kindle is a no-brainer.All in all a great device. However there are a number of limiting factors and mild annoyances that build up to a loss of a star for me. The good news is that many of these can be fixed; the question is whether they might actually be fixed. Here's my problems with the device:- Apps are solely from the Amazon Kindle App store. This is useful in some ways, as you can control apps from your amazon account remotely, but also limiting in others. Compared to the Google Play store the selection is lacking. Although it should be mentioned that this may be partially be design, since there are many apps that do not work (yet) on this kindle's version of android.  Even so, apps can be side-loaded onto the device if you have basic technical know-how. For example, the Humble Bundle App works perfectly on my kindle. To be fair a lot of apps are pretty much crap, but I'd like to have the options for more, albeit mixed with some quality control.- App permissions can sometimes be downright creepy, i.e. a stupid game or simple app having access to data  that it clearly does not need to function and you would rather keep personal. I understand that this is not strictly Amazon's responsibility but rather that of the third-party developers and the owner of the kindle, but its worth mentioning here.- The placement of the only physical buttons, the power and volume buttons, isn't as intuitive as I would like. I find myself accidentally pressing the wrong ones from time to time. I suppose that I might just have to get used to them though.- I would've liked the option for a mircoSD slot, but I guess we live in the age of the ~cloud~. The 16 GB isn't really 16 GB, which is par for the course. But its even less than you might think, you only get 10.6 GB. Unless all your content is on or going to be on your amazon account, spring for the 32 or 64 GB model.- The 7” version only has a camera facing you; no camera facing outwards.  Not really super important unless you want it.- The Carousel is plain stupid. This is a function that works well on other multi-touch devices, but on this kindle it just plain doesn't work well. The intended function is to quickly pick up what you had been doing previously, and for reading books this is still useful. However for everything else it isn't very. In particular if you load up things (like drm-free books via usb) they ALL appear as new on the Carousel, and you can only remove them one at a time. If there was someway to customize it, like so that everything new did not appear and you could lock in which apps you wanted to appear on it, then it might be functional, but as it is I ignore it completely unless I want to get back to the last book I was reading.- Some options for organizing books would be helpful rather than just sort by title/author/recent and displaying covers. An option for alphabetized letter sections would be nice, as well as some indication of a scroll bar to the right hand side.- One of the first things I did in my settings was turn off letting things automatically detect where I am located. I have wi-fi only, and I don't really need it on, plus nearly everything asks for it which just kind of creeps me out. But, and this is the most annoying thing, every single time an app or website requests it I get a pop-up asking me if I want to enable location-based services. Let me repeat this: Every. Single. Time. And a lot of apps will consistently ask. So at least once every 5-20 minutes, depending on what I'm using, I will be interrupted by this pop-up asking me this question even though the answer is pretty much always no. Which I thought was, you know, the point of me disabling it in the settings to begin with. I don't want to have to turn on Quiet Time all the time just to get this to stop.

Reviews.Title: Yes!!!  Amazon finally got it right with this one!
Reviews.Author: Christine "Christine"
Reviews.Content: I have really struggled with past Kindle devices, always finding something I could not live with.  Just this past month I have tried and returned 2 other Kindle devices that were plain frustrating to me (the 8.9" Fire HD and the 7" Fire HD).  I figured I would give it one more last try with this one, and boy was I ever surprised.  Blazing fast, beautiful screen, slim design, awesome new lay-out.  The sound is absolutely amazing, way better than that of my iPad Mini.  If I had one critique it would be the position of the on/off switch and the volume controls.  Takes some getting used to.  I also wished the speakers were in the front, but I am not complaining too much on that one.  I now find myself leaving my iPad Mini at home, and taking this with me instead.  Never thought that day would come!Highly recommended (in fact, I ended up buying another one for my Dad.  With the mayday option, I know he too will love it!).

Reviews.Title: Replace my original version #1 kindle - Love this thing!!

Reviews.Title: perfect gift!!!

Reviews.Title: love it so far
Reviews.Author: L. Hayes
Reviews.Content: I only got this today. The color is amazing!I did download some puff files I cannot find on the Adobe app but their in here somewhere. I'm sure I'll figure it out.Mobile files downloaded great. My books were on I n seconds that I'll had on a kindle app. It's not too heavy not extremely light either. Reviews.Title: Love it!
